His plan is to rob a corner store and split the money. Everyone goes along with the plan except for Q, who is competing that night in a deejay contest. At the club, Q is a rousing success, but he spies the stern faces of his friends through the cheering crowd and realizes that he has to go along with the robbery, which goes completely wrong(n)

programme.title: Northmen - A Viking Saga
programme.desc: After being banished from their homeland, a group of ruthless vikings are shipwrecked behind enemy lines. As a mercenary army bears down on them, it is a race against time to escape or be hunted down(n)

programme.title: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
programme.desc: The sci-fi space-capades of futuristic bounty hunters who patrol the galaxy in a banged-up spaceship called the Bebop(n)

programme.title: Spaceballs
programme.desc: Mel Brooks offers his irreverent and rollicking take on Star Wars and other sci-fi epics in this goofy comedy. The story features such characters as the princess Vespa, her nemesis Dark Helmet, and her hero Lone Starr(n)

programme.title: Bulletproof Monk
programme.desc: For 60 years, a Tibetan monk has protected an ancient scroll which gives its owner immortality and incredible power. With a new generation of Nazis determined to snatch the scroll, the monk recruits a young pickpocket to help defeat evil(n)

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Cinematographer Ernest R. Dickerson directed and co-wrote this crime drama about a group of friends who get involved in a robbery. Bishop (Tupac Shakur), Q (Omar Epps), Raheem (Khalil Kain), and Steel (Jermaine Hopkins) are four Harlem friends who spend their days skipping school, getting in fights, and casually shoplifting. The only member of the group who has plans for the future is Q, who dreams of becoming a deejay. But one day Bishop happens to see James Cagney in White Heat and the film inspires him to buy a gun. His plan is to rob a corner store and split the money. Everyone goes along with the plan except for Q, who is competing that night in a deejay contest. At the club, Q is a rousing success, but he spies the stern faces of his friends through the cheering crowd and realizes that he has to go along with the robbery, which goes completely wrong(n)

programme.title: Northmen - A Viking Saga
programme.desc: After being banished from their homeland, a group of ruthless vikings are shipwrecked behind enemy lines. As a mercenary army bears down on them, it is a race against time to escape or be hunted down(n)

programme.title: Spaceballs
programme.desc: Mel Brooks offers his irreverent and rollicking take on Star Wars and other sci-fi epics in this goofy comedy. The story features such characters as the princess Vespa, her nemesis Dark Helmet, and her hero Lone Starr(n)

programme.title: Tank Girl
programme.desc: Living in extreme conditions outside the realm of Water and Power, Tank Girl and her side kick Jet Girl are attacked and taken prisoner by the evil overlord(n)

programme.title: Three Days of the Condor
programme.desc: Robert Redford plays a CIA researcher whose job somehow triggered the murder of seven of his colleagues. Faye Dunaway, Cliff Robertson. Joubert: Max von Sydow. Wabash: John Houseman. Barber: Walter McGinn. Atwood: Addison Powell. Wicks: Michael Kane. Janice: Tina Chen. Sydney Pollack directed(n)

programme.title: The Last Legion
programme.desc: Cut-rate sword-and-sorcery spectacle set against the fall of the Roman Empire, following the 12-year-old emperor and his epic battle against a ruthless warlord. Colin Firth, Ben Kingsley, Aishwarya Rai, Peter Mullan, Kevin McKidd. Directed by Doug Lefler(n)

programme.title: Chain Reaction
programme.desc: Eddie Kasalivich, an undergraduate at the University of Chicago, works as a technician for a scientific team that discovers an alternative, low-cost, pollution-free fuel source. When one of the chief scientists is murdered and the invention stolen, Eddie and physicist Lily Sinclair are framed for it and have to flee for their lives, with the FBI, CIA and other involved parties in close pursuit(n)

programme.title: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
programme.desc: The sci-fi space-capades of futuristic bounty hunters who patrol the galaxy in a banged-up spaceship called the Bebop(n)

programme.title: Big Trouble
programme.desc: Barry Sonnenfeld directs this kissing cousin of his own 1995 hit Get Shorty, a comic caper adapted by Robert Ramsey and Matthew Stone from the novel by newspaper humorist Dave Barry. When two New Jersey hitmen (Dennis Farina and Jack Kehler) show up in Miami to whack crooked businessman Arthur Herk (Stanley Tucci), they happen to creep into his backyard at the same time as Matt (Ben Foster), a high school kid with his own assassination plans. Only, Matt plans to use nothing heavier than a squirt gun on Jenny (Zooey Deschanel), Arthur's daughter, as part of a school-wide game of "killer." When the plans collide, mayhem ensues, and Matt's struggling ex-columnist dad (Tim Allen, loosely modeled on Barry), Arthur's bored wife (Rene Russo), and two confused police officers (Janeane Garofalo and Patrick Warburton) are also called to the scene. Shift to the next day and there's more craziness to follow. Two dimwitted petty criminals (Tom Sizemore and Johnny Knoxville) choose the exact moment Arthur is transacting a nuclear arms deal to hold up the dive bar where they're regulars, which is actually a front for the Russian mob. Soon the whole motley cast -- including an agreeable drifter (Jason Lee), a buxom maid (Sofia Vergara), and a pair of ruthless FBI agents (Heavy D and Omar Epps) -- are caught up in a hostage scenario in which the weapon accidentally gets brought aboard a hijacked plan(n)

programme.title: Hackers
programme.desc: Thriller for the '90s in which Jonny Lee Miller stars as Dade Murphy, aka Zero Cool, a teenager renowned among his peers for crashing over 1,500 Wall Street computers at the age of 11. Now 18, Dade is anxious to get back into the world of hacking from which he has been banned for the last seven years. Having joined forces with a feisty fellow hacker named Kate Libby (Angelina Jolie), aka Acid Burn, Dade finds himself set up by a master hacker who has framed them for stealing millions of dollars from a major corporation(n)

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: Frank takes a job driving the young son of Miami's anti-drugs tsar. Florida was supposed to be a holiday, but when Colombian killers kidnap the boy and frame Frank, he has to start taking life more seriously(n)

programme.title: Agent Cody Banks 2: Destination London
programme.desc: In England, the teen super-spy poses as a music prodigy to thwart a renegade agent's plot to take over the world with a mind-control device(n)

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: When two children find a mysterious old board game and start to play it, they release a mysterious man called Alan, who's closely followed by a horde of stampedimg animals! It seeems he and a friend discovered the game 25 years earlier, and he became trapped in it. Can the two kids tame the madcap menagerie and help Alan to escape from his supernatural prison? Great computer animated effects and some excellent perfromances make this a truly magical film that's fun for all the family(n)

programme.title: Burn Notice
programme.desc: Michael completes his mission to capture Tyler Gray, the man who murdered his brother. But his triumph is short-lived when he learns that Tom Card sent him to Panama to be killed. Still reeling from the betrayal, the spy and his team plot a way to smuggle themselves back into the United States with their prisoner. They attempt to hijack a cargo plane, but Gray uses the opportunity to make his escape.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The detectives find themselves in the middle of a dramatic case when a man claims to have murdered seven people, but refuses to identify himself. Meanwhile, Brenda goes house-hunting with Fritz. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a personal trainer who was killed in the car park of a restaurant, but the only witness is a frightened valet with OCD. Meanwhile, the department has to complete anti-terrorism training to receive funding from the government. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: When a woman is found dead in her apartment, her son, recently paroled after serving 15 years for murder, becomes the prime suspect. Goren and Eames meet the detective who investigated the earlier case and discover the man may have been wrongly convicted - revealing a complex cover-up that implicates the policeman himself. Crime drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Goren and Eames investigate when a man's release from prison coincides with the murder of his wife and lawyer. His claims to have been the killer's real target are given a credibility boost when Goren learns that a notorious criminal might have received a hit-list that featured his son. Crime drama, with Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team uncovers faulty bulletproof vests in an abandoned truck filled with stolen USMC merchandise, and attempts to locate the source of the cargo and any vests that could have been sent to military personnel overseas. Crime drama, guest starring Challen Cates, with Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: DiNozzo confronts a man impersonating a Navy officer, which results in guns being drawn, and the only eyewitness to the case is the Special Agent's father - who is in town to disclose a secret to his son. The 250th episode of the crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Michael Weatherly.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Tensions run high after two Latino gang members are murdered, and the department must solve the crime before the situation develops into a gang war. Brenda has a health scare when she finally visits her doctor. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda and her team face a race against time to catch a notorious serial killer, apparently striking after an absence of several years, when the bodies of two women are found bearing his grisly hallmarks. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: When the daughter of a recently deceased senator is found murdered, Goren and Eames uncover a few startling facts about the family - the dead woman had tried to have her father cryonically frozen, her brother is not really the senator's son, and before cremation the old man's brain was stolen. Crime drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Adolescent boys become chief suspects in the murder of a man and his son. The team thinks the gang is being used to operate a bicycle theft ring, but the investigation leads them to a studio owner who brainwashes youngsters to prove their worthiness for his own nefarious purposes. Crime drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A bomb detonates at a military charity concert, killing two men. Called to investigate, Tony and McGee try to determine whether the intended target was the 1980s rocker headlining the act or if the attack was part of a larger scheme against the military. Meanwhile, Jimmy prepares for parenthood. Keith Carradine guest stars, with Mark Harmon and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part one of two. Gibbs joins forces with the FBI when the body of a congressman and former agent washes ashore in New Orleans. Together they try to determine if the murder could be linked to a well-known case the victim had previously worked on during his career. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Cote de Pablo and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: Prison Break
programme.desc: Lincoln and C-Note seek the `Sheik of Light', while Michael and his cellmate Whip make an attempt to escape from Ogygia. Plus, Sara comes back into contact with Paul Kellerman.(n)

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Megan faces the consequences of her actions, while Kyle and Anderson come to a stark realisation regarding the increasing number of possessions in Rome.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: The final part in the trilogy of extended Star Wars-themed episodes, based on the film Return of the Jedi. With the guest voices of Anne Hathaway, Rush Limbaugh and Carrie Fisher alongside Seth MacFarlane, Seth Green and Mila Kunis.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger rediscovers one of his personas, Ricky Spanish, and soon remembers why he is the most hated person in Langley Falls. Meanwhile, an African child who Stan and Francine sponsored shows up on their doorstep.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan is embarrassed by Steve's recreational activities, so he takes him to Mexico to teach him how to be more manly - but the plan backfires when they are kidnapped by members of a local drug cartel.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter accidentally injures the best player in his company's softball team, and tries to get on Mr Weed's good side by inviting new neighbour Joe to join as a replacement - unaware that he is a wheelchair user. Animated comedy, with the voices of Seth McFarlane and Alex Borstein.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: The family sets out on a trip to New York in a bid to win back Chris's place in a Scout group, but Peter takes a wrong turn en route and ends up at a Native American casino - where Lois becomes obsessed with the slot machines. Animated comedy, with the voices of Seth Green and Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger acts as the Smith family therapist under the guise of his alter ego Dr Penguin, but his services are cut short when he is sent to fight in the Iraq War - leaving Klaus with the opportunity to take over his counselling duties.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Francine ignores her husband's objections and buys Steve the dog he has always wanted. However, when a horrific accident leaves the canine in critical condition, a traumatic memory from his childhood leaves Stan unable to turn off life support.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: Foreign Affairs AKA Games People Play.
programme.desc: Bonnie crosses the line when she and Lois take a trip to Paris, while Peter home-schools Chris and Meg using unorthodox teaching methods. With the voices of Seth MacFarlane and Alex Borstein.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: The Griffins become millionaires after Peter blows his life savings on lottery tickets, but things take a turn for the worse as they struggle to cope with their new-found wealth. Comedy, with the voices of Seth MacFarlane and Alex Borstein.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan grows fed up with Hayley and Jeff's lazy behaviour, so he bets them he and Francine can live on the minimum wage for a month. Steve and Roger undertake a mission to test-drive their dream car.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.sub-title: The Kidney Stays in the Picture.
programme.desc: Stan discovers that Francine was unfaithful to him before they got married, leaving him worried that Hayley might not be his biological daughter. He travels back in time to learn the identity of her father, but when he inadvertently disrupts past events, he must do everything in his power to avoid changing the future.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Burn Notice
programme.desc: Card orders Tyler Gray to burn down Michael's loft, and the spy has no choice but to let it happen if he wants his former mentor to continue believing that he and his team died in Panama. In the hope of turning the tables on Card, Michael uses Gray to find out what he has been up to, but the mission is interrupted when one of Fiona's prison buddies, Ayn, shows up looking for her help.(n)

programme.desc: Brenda is removed from investigative duty by the department psychiatrist after shooting a serial killer, and tasked with accompanying a journalist on a routine patrol. programme.sub-title: The Old Man and the Lisa

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer Simpson in Kidney Trouble. Homer Simpson (voice of Dan Castellaneta) treats the family to a day at "Bloodbath Gulch," a Wild West Show complete with saloon, and Grandpa (also voiced by Castellaneta) enjoys several sarsaparillas while the family watches the phony shoot-outs. On the way home, Grandpa suddenly needs to use the bathroom, but Homer ignores his pleas, and Grandpa's kidneys literally explode. Grandpa needs a new kidney and fast, and Homer is persuaded to donate one of his. However, once Homer learns that donating an organ could possibly be dangerous, he gets cold feet, and when his homemade mechanical kidney (made from a whistle and a beer can) is deemed inadequate, Homer skips town. As Grandpa's life hangs in the balance, Homer boards a tramp steamer, where he meets "The Lost Souls," a band of desperate men and women who have abandoned responsibility and consequence for a rootless life at sea. "Homer Simpson In: 'Kidney Trouble'" first aired on December 6, 1998(n)

programme.title: King of the Grill – Wood-Fired Cooking
programme.desc: Traeger, the Original Wood Pellet Grill, turns the raw potential of uncooked food into phenomenal food with wood-fired appeal. See what makes a Traeger tick, and how its 6-in-1 versatility transcends the capabilities of conventional propane(n)

programme.title: Easy Computer
programme.desc: Frustrated by traditional computers? Introducing Telikin! A simple and easy to use family computer that combines video chat, photo sharing, email and many more popular features into a sleek, touchscreen device(n)

programme.title: Mad About You
programme.desc: Sofa's Choice. Jamie forces a reluctant Paul to give up his day off and join her on a shopping expedition for a sofa - but fails to anticipate what a fuss he will make(n)

programme.title: Mad About You
programme.desc: Sunday Times. Others' Sundays intrude before Paul and Jamie can decide how to spend the day(n)

programme.title: Anger Management
programme.desc: Charlie & the 100th Episode. Charlie must make a difficult career decision in the series finale(n)

programme.title: Anger Management
programme.desc: Charlie Goes Back to Therapy. When anger therapist Charlie Goodson almost beats his ex-wife's boyfriend with a lamp could it be time to return to therapy himself?(n)

programme.title: Raising Hope
programme.desc: Dream Hoarders. Virginia is outed as a hoarder when the family is forced to baby-proof the house after Hope learns how to crawl; Jimmy invents reasons to see Sabrina at the grocery store(n)

programme.title: Raising Hope
programme.desc: Say Cheese. A visit from Sabrina inspires Jimmy to start including pictures of Hope in the family photo album, despite the Chances' spotty track record when it comes to group portraits(n)

programme.title: Parks and Recreation
programme.desc: Sweetums. The parks department forms a partnership with a local company to sell energy bars at the parks in Pawnee, but Leslie tries to stop the deal when she discovers how unhealthy the snacks are. Mark reluctantly agrees to help Tom move out of his house(n)

programme.title: Parks and Recreation
programme.desc: Galentine's Day. Leslie and Justin try to reunite Leslie's Mom with an old flame for Valentine's Day, only to discover he's a total loon(n)

programme.title: Parks and Recreation
programme.desc: Woman of the Year. Ron wins a "Woman of the Year" award for a project Leslie started, and she's not happy about it. Meanwhile, Tom decides he wants to invest in a local club(n)

programme.title: Parks and Recreation
programme.desc: The Possum. Leslie puts together a task force at the mayor's request to catch a possum at the golf course, while Mark forces Ron to get his personal building up to code(n)

programme.title: The Purge
programme.desc: In this terrifying thriller, a family defend their lavish home against murderous intruders during the one night of the year when all crime is legal. However, their resolve is tested by a stranger who appears in their gated community pleading for help(n)

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: In this riveting sci-fi film set in a future where the privileged reside on a space station called Elysium while the less fortunate live on the surface of a ruined Earth, one man seeks to access Elysium in a desperate bid to save his own life and bring balance to a divided society(n)

Disaster movie maven Roland Emmerich (Independence Day, The Day After Tomorrow) crafts this apocalyptic sci-fi thriller following the prophecy stated by the ancient Mayan calendar, which says that the world will come to an end on December 21, 2012. When a global cataclysm thrusts the world into chaos, divorced writer and father Jackson Curtis (John Cusack) joins the race to ensure that humankind is not completely wiped out. Chiwetel Ejiofor, Danny Glover, Amanda Peet, Thandie Newton, and Oliver Platt round out the cast of this end-of-the-world thriller co-scripted by the director and his 10,000 B.C. writer/composer, Harald Kloser(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Home Away From Homer. Flanders moves after Homer humiliates him, but neither man is pleased with his new neighbours. Jason Bateman has a cameo(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Monkey Suit. Lisa is arrested when she defies the town's new law on evolution. But a family member unexpectedly saves the day in court(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Boys of Bummer. Bart is once again enemy number one in Springfield when he makes an error that costs the Isotopes baseball team the Little League championship. D'oh!(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Husbands and Knives. Marge opens a gym for real women because she's disenchanted with Springfield's snooty, glitzy L.A. Body Works. Her gym, Shapes: A Gym for Women, is a huge success, launching a chain that makes Marge rich and famous. But Homer fears Marge will leave him for someone more attractive and goes to extreme lengths to try to save his marriage(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Let's Go Fly a Coot. Grampa's days in the Air Force are rehashed, while Bart picks up the smoking habit in an effort to impress Milhouse's Dutch cousin, Annika(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Marge-ian Chronicles. Lisa signs up to go to Mars on a future one-way mission, much to the chagrin of Marge(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Four Great Women and a Manicure
programme.desc: Four Great Women and a Manicure. While visiting the nail salon for a manicure and pedicure, Marge and Lisa discuss whether or not a woman can be clever, powerful and beautiful simultaneously, regardless of marital status. During the debate, they recount four classic stories about important female figures from history, literature and legend. Featuring Jodie Foster as the voice of Maggie(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Once Upon a Time in Springfield
programme.desc: Once Upon a Time in Springfield. In the 450th episode, Krusty the Clown teams up with a female costar, Princess Penelope (voice of Anne Hathaway), and before long he proposes marriage to her. Meanwhile, Mr. Burns and the workers clash at the nuclear power plant. Guest voices include Eartha Kitt and Jackie Mason(n)

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: The Man From Jupiter. Sterling is very upset when he learns that Mallory is dating his hero (and man-crush) Burt Reynolds (who provides his own voice). More upset, in fact, than he is about the Cuban hit squad that's out to get him(n)

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: El Contador. Cyril proves his worth when he is promoted from accountant to field agent(n)

programme.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
programme.desc: A professor invents a ray with the power to reduce objects in size. Unfortunately, his kids and their meddling friends activate it and are shrunk to microscopic proportions. When they are accidentally thrown out with the rubbish, the children have to contend with all kinds of animals and insects on their journey home across the backyard. Disney comedy, with Rick Moranis, Marcia Strassman and Amy O'Neill.(n)

programme.title: Epic
programme.desc: A teenager wanders into a forest that her scientist father believes is home to a race of miniature people. She stumbles on the tiny creatures and is shrunk down to their size so she can carry out a quest to save their new queen from an invading army. Animated adventure, with the voices of Amanda Seyfried, Josh Hutcherson, Colin Farrell and Christoph Waltz.(n)

programme.title: Rio 2
programme.desc: Parrots Jewel and Blu lead a happy life together in Rio with their three chicks, until they find themselves hurled into an expedition up the Amazon. The journey leads to an encounter with an old enemy, while Blu also has to win the approval of Jewel's fearsome father. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jesse Eisenberg, Anne Hathaway and Jamie Foxx.(n)

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: An earthquake forces a bear from the Peruvian jungle to start a new life in London. He finds modern Britain to be very different from the stories told to him by his aunt, but makes a new home with a kindly family. However, a sinister taxidermist intends to turn him into a museum exhibit. Comedy based on Michael Bond's series of children's books, starring Hugh Bonneville, Sally Hawkins and Nicole Kidman, with the voice of Ben Whishaw.(n)

programme.title: St Trinian's 2: The Legend of Fritton's Gold
programme.desc: The mischievous schoolgirls embark on a hunt for buried treasure after learning their headmistress Miss Fritton is a descendant of pirates. However, they face competition in the form of a dastardly lord eager to locate the loot for himself. Comedy sequel, starring Rupert Everett, Gemma Arterton, Colin Firth, David Tennant and Talulah Riley.(n)

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: A repairman is assigned to salvage the remaining resources from Earth, which has been left a devastated wasteland after a war with an alien race. He discovers a human survivor on the surface of the planet, an encounter that exposes secrets from the past that threaten the future of the human race. Sci-fi adventure, starring Tom Cruise and Morgan Freeman.(n)

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: In a future dominated by the deadly robots, resistance leader John Connor fights to stop the creation of an advanced new terminator and searches for the teenager destined to go back in time and become his father. Elsewhere, a mysterious stranger with no memory is about to learn the shocking truth about his origins. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Christian Bale, Sam Worthington and Anton Yelchin.(n)

programme.title: Mindscape
programme.desc: A psychic with the ability to explore people's memories uses his talents to aid the police, until a case goes disastrously wrong. Desperate for work, he agrees to help a wealthy couple discover why their teenage daughter is on a hunger strike, but beings to fear she is manipulating her memories to deceive him. Fantasy thriller, starring Mark Strong, Taissa Farmiga and Brian Cox.(n)

programme.title: The Muppet Movie
programme.desc: Kermit the frog is persuaded by his agent that he has a future in movies. He sets off on a journey across America to realise his dream, gathering a crowd of like-minded friends along the way - but the owner of a French restaurant plans to make him the dish of the day. Comedy, starring Dom DeLuise and Charles Durning alongside the puppet characters, with cameos from Mel Brooks, Orson Welles and Steve Martin.(n)

programme.title: The Spy Next Door
programme.desc: A Chinese secret agent falls in love with a single mother while helping the CIA apprehend a terrorist, and decides to quit the espionage business. He offers to look after her three kids for the weekend, but struggles to cope with their mischief-making - and to make matters worse, the terrorist escapes from prison. Comedy, with Jackie Chan and Magnus Scheving.(n)

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: A casino magnate approaches a group of no-hopers with the offer of $2million to whoever retrieves the sum from a locker in a train station in New Mexico, prompting a madcap cross-continent dash. Meanwhile, the casino owner's high-rolling gambler friends place bets on which of the bumbling contestants will win. Comedy, with Rowan Atkinson, John Cleese, Whoopi Goldberg, Kathy Bates, Seth Green and Cuba Gooding Jr.(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice
programme.desc: Elizabeth Bennet is one of five sisters whose mother is determined to find them suitable husbands. The arrival of a wealthy gentleman and his friends at a nearby mansion leads to an introduction between Elizabeth and the aloof Mr Darcy, to whom she takes an instant dislike. However, an unexpected attraction eventually develops. Period drama based on Jane Austen's novel, starring Keira Knightley, Matthew Macfadyen and Judi Dench.(n)

programme.title: Airplane
programme.desc: The passengers on board an ill-fated airliner become increasingly jittery when the flight crew flounder during a food-poisoning crisis. As ground control personnel struggle heroically to ensure the plane lands safely, a traumatised war veteran must face his fear to take the controls. Spoof disaster movie, starring Robert Hays, Leslie Nielsen, Robert Stack and Lloyd Bridges.(n)

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1
programme.desc: Katniss Everdeen is brought to a secretive underground society following the destruction of the televised deathmatch. She becomes the figurehead of a revolution against the despotic Panem regime, while her friend Peeta remains a captive of its tyrannical president. Part one of the two-part conclusion to the sci-fi adventure series, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Julianne Moore and Donald Sutherland.(n)

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: Earth is invaded by parasitic aliens which possess humans, but one of the creatures discovers the consciousness of her teenage host has not been fully repressed. The human part of their personality persuades her to turn her back on her race and seek out free humans, leading her to a resistance group fighting to free mankind. Sci-fi adventure, starring Saoirse Ronan, Max Irons and William Hurt.(n)

programme.title: Una Mujer para Matar o Morir
Viaje al centro de la tierra
Paul Hollywood: City Bakes
programme.desc: The baker and celebrity chef travels to cities around the world to visit local bakeries and the bakers who work there. In the first edition, Paul heads to New York, where he discovers how doughnuts have been recreated with fresh, innovative flavours. Plus, he meets internet sensation Jim Lahey, who has invented a new, simple way of baking bread at home.(n)

programme.title: Paul Hollywood: City Bakes
programme.desc: Paul visits Paris, where he sees the classic croissant and baguette baked in the city that invented them, and creates a `Choux Eiffel Tower' for a special occasion bake.(n)

programme.title: Paul Hollywood: City Bakes
programme.desc: At London's historic Cliveden House Hotel, Paul recreates his idea of heavenly baked perfection; the classic afternoon tea.(n)

programme.title: Paul Hollywood: City Bakes
programme.desc: The celebrity chef visits St Petersburg, where he samples layered honey cake and vatrushka, a delicate curd tart, as well as Russian pies.(n)

programme.title: Paul Hollywood: City Bakes

programme.desc: Ina Garten focuses on egg recipes and reveals the secrets of omelettes, souffle and hollandaise.(n)

programme.desc: Pasta recipes including an Italian baked dish, a Jewish classic sweet and savoury dish, and an Asian pasta salad.(n)

programme.desc: Ina Garten provides tips to organise a cocktail party with home-made canapes and how to set up a cocktail bar at home.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond prepares a care package to send to Alex, who is away at university, including brownie cookies, homemade cheddar crackers, spicy party mix and crazy chocolate bark.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.sub-title: The Other Men In My Life.
programme.desc: Ree Drummond is sharing about the other men in her life, like her dad, brother, brother-in-law and father-in-law, and their favourite sweets.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond cooks for her family reunion, a camp out down by the creek, by making preparations for cheesy bacon hot dogs and campfire quesadillas over the fire.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond shares some great ideas for simple, minimal-prep dorm room food made with basic tools.(n)

programme.title: Hairy Dieters: How to Love Food and Lose Weight
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers create low-calorie versions of their favourite party treats, including fairy cakes, quiche and chilli tacos, and Olly Smith offers advice on wines suitable for slimmers. The duo then reflect on how trying to lose weight has improved their lives and learn whether the Big Dieters have also managed to change their eating habits - before paying a final visit to diabetes expert Roy Taylor and dietician Ashley Adamson to discover if their new diets have yielded the desired results.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Comfort Food
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver gives some of the nation's favourite dishes a twist, reinventing British classics like shepherd's pie, rustling up outdoor treats and transforming old-school desserts such as pavlova and sticky-toffee pudding. In the first edition, the chef takes on three comfort foods at his home in Essex, and he's joined by friend Christian, aka DJ BBQ, to reveal his ultimate burger - including what cut of meat to use, how to cook it and what to have on the side. Plus, Jamie's secret sauce recipe.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Comfort Food
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver is joined by his friend, the Italian chef Gennaro Contaldo, to make bolognese ravioli, and also creates the ultimate cheese toastie as well as his take on the nation's favourite dish - chicken tikka masala - cooked over an open fire.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Comfort Food
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver gives more of the nation's favourite dishes a twist, making sticky toffee pudding with his mother Sally and rustling up a mouth-watering steak and onion sandwich. The chef also prepares an Italian classic - osso buco with saffron risotto.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Comfort Food
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver puts his stamp on three comfort food classics. First up is a retro treat - chicken Kiev, before the chef prepares spaghetti vongole with a non-traditional pink twist and a deluxe shepherd's pie made with slow-roasted lamb shoulder rather than mince.(n)

programme.title: Hairy Dieters: How to Love Food and Lose Weight

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond prepares brunch for three generations of Drummond girls, including maple oat nut scones, a cowgirl quiche, and champagne oranges.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Over an evening walk, Ree Drummond plans some fast and healthy meals, including a houmous wrap, ginger steak salad, a grilled nectarine salad and a spicy cauliflower stir-fry.(n)

programme.title: Korean Food Made Simple
programme.desc: Chef Judy Joo visits rural Korea and some of the food festivals in the autumn, celebrating the harvest and kimchi. She samples the soups and stews eaten at this time of year.(n)

programme.title: Korean Food Made Simple
programme.desc: Executive chef Judy Joo introduces the staples of the Korean pantry - chilli paste, rice and green tea crop-visiting, a gochujang village, a rice harvest and tea plantations.(n)

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: New series. Young bakers serve up two delicious signature items for a bake sale, and must also make a third item using a childhood flavour combination.(n)

programme.title: Hairy Dieters: How to Love Food and Lose Weight
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers embark on a quest to lose weight while still enjoying the food they love by creating healthier versions of their favourite recipes. They also search for ways to make their lifestyles more active - including swapping their beloved motorbikes for pedal-powered machines - and learn why obesity is an increasingly serious problem in 21st-century Britain.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's 15 Minute Meals
programme.desc: The chef gets ready to provide more delicious recipes as quickly as possible, beginning with Moroccan bream accompanied by couscous salad, pomegranate and harissa, and British burgers with shred salad, pickles and stuffing.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's 15 Minute Meals
programme.desc: Chef Jamie Oliver prepares more quick meals, including his recipe for jerk pork with grilled corn and crunchy tortilla salad, as well as minestrone poached chicken and salsa verde.(n)

programme.desc: Del's beloved mum apparently makes contact during a seance at the Nag's Head, inspiring him to visit the doctor to seek treatment for stomach cramps. Admitted to hospital for tests, he fears there is something seriously wrong with him - but a bacon sandwich and an alcoholic drink smuggled in by Rodney soon put the smile back on his face. Comedy, with David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: The Trotters meet a pregnant German woman who is in need of help, so eternal optimist Del-Boy becomes her saviour, aiming to earn himself some money into the bargain by making Marlene and Boycie's dreams come true. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst, Buster Merryfield and John Challis.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: A weeping statue in the local church gives Del an idea for a money-making scheme to help a hospice under threat of closure. However, his efforts are thwarted by the weather. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield.(n)

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Life for identical twins Jared and Simon and their sister Mallory begins afresh when their mother inherits a spooky mansion. But after moving in, strange things begin to happen, and as the youngsters investigate, they discover a book that opens up a mysterious world of amazing supernatural creatures. Fantasy adventure, starring Freddie Highmore in a dual role alongside Sarah Bolger and Nick Nolte.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: The Trotter brothers are guests at a wedding, where they are intrigued to hear their dear departed mother inherited the ill-gotten gains of an East End bank robber - but nobody has ever found the loot. Christmas special of the long-running comedy, originally shown in 1987, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield, with a guest appearance by Joan Sims.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Rodney leaves home after a fight with Cassandra, and arranges a date with receptionist Tanya in an effort to make his wife jealous - but Del's interference ensures the plan fails to go as smoothly as it should. Christmas special first shown in 1990, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Rodney ties the knot with Cassandra, but Del has more on his mind than best man duties as the dreaded Driscoll brothers arrive at the Nag's Head baying for his blood over some stolen mobile phones. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Gwyneth Strong.(n)

programme.title: Coming to America
programme.desc: A bored African prince defies his father's plans for an arranged marriage and escapes to the USA to find a bride on his own terms. Comedy, starring Eddie Murphy and Arsenio Hall in several roles, with James Earl Jones, Allison Dean, Eriq La Salle and Madge Sinclair.(n)

programme.title: I'm Alan Partridge
programme.desc: Alan jumps for joy at the news that his arch-enemy, BBC commissioning editor Tony Hayers, has died in a bizarre accident, convinced it can now only be a matter of time before he is back where he belongs - fronting his own TV chat show. Steve Coogan stars.(n)

programme.title: Little Britain
programme.desc: Emily and Florence visit a bridal shop to try on wedding dresses. Dafydd runs a gay stall at the village fete, and when Lou's van is blocked in at the car park Andy is upset that he is going to miss My Hero.(n)

programme.title: Peep Show
programme.desc: Mark is devastated to learn Sophie is moving away, but she suggests they bridge the gap between them by having phone sex. An eccentric old friend asks Jeremy if he wants to manage a pub she owns, but her behaviour gradually grows stranger - leading the flatmates to consider sectioning her. Starring Robert Webb and David Mitchell.(n)

programme.title: The Catherine Tate Show
programme.desc: A festive edition of the sketch show from 2007. The actress goes back to the 1950s twice - once to explore the history of foul-mouthed pensioner Mrs Harris, and again for her spoof of Life on Mars, which features Philip Glenister. Guest star George Michael checks into hospital and discovers he is at the mercy of Bernie, the man-eating nurse who refuses to take no for an answer. Plus, appearances by Kathy Burke and Tamzin Outhwaite.(n)

programme.title: Shooting Stars
programme.desc: Will Self is joined by strongman Geoff Capes and actress Patsy Kensit, while Ulrika Jonsson welcomes former racing driver Damon Hill and regular Johnny Vegas to the slapstick quiz show.(n)

programme.title: Shooting Stars
programme.desc: Vic Reeves and Bob Mortimer return with their usual brand of silliness, with team captains Will Self and Radio 2's Sara Cox standing in for regular Ulrika Jonsson. Their guests are Lisa Snowdon, Neil Hamilton and Liz Smith, along with permanent team member Johnny Vegas.(n)

programme.title: The Green Green Grass
programme.desc: Tyler is left cold by all the kerfuffle as the family awaits the arrival of his French exchange student. He even considers getting engaged to Beth in a bid to get out of paying a return visit to France. However, the guest's eventual arrival causes a stir all round. John Challis and Sue Holderness star.(n)

programme.title: Butterflies

programme.title: Sorry
programme.desc: Timothy falls for a narrowboat owner and resolves to leave home, but is surprised when Mother appears to be in favour. Ronnie Corbett stars.(n)

programme.desc: Lionel's script about his early romance with Jean goes into production, but he is aghast at some of the liberties taken by the brash American producers, and tries to stop them making any radical changes. Geoffrey Palmer and Judi Dench star.(n)

programme.title: Whatever Happened to the Likely Lads
programme.desc: Bob and Terry decide to chat up a couple of girls in a restaurant to see if they are still attractive to the opposite sex. Comedy, starring James Bolam and Rodney Bewes.(n)

programme.title: Auf Wiedersehen, Pet
programme.desc: Oz is forced to take radical action to ensure the boys do not come out of the bridge job penniless, but it seems unlikely that his unique brand of sexual charm will save the day - and his doubts about son Rod's masculinity do not do much to help his focus. Just as they seem doomed to fail, a mysterious stranger arrives. Dick Clement and Ian La Frenais's comedy drama, with Tim Healy, Jimmy Nail and Timothy Spall.(n)

programme.title: Jack
programme.desc: Prime. A look at the bulk of Jack Nicklaus' on-course career achievements, including many of his record 18 professional major championships and 73 PGA Tour victories(n)

programme.title: Jack

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Chapter 14: Lone Star Lessons. Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal reveal what you can learn from the greatest Texas-born players and teachers. Lee Trevino is inducted into the Martin Hall of Fame with a lesson on how his swing can help stop hooks and pulls. Martin also teaches what you can learn from Ben Hogan, Byron Nelson, Ben Crenshaw, Kathy Whitworth, and Jordan Spieth. Harvey Penick's Little Red Book, the best-selling golf instruction book of all-time, is featured in Martin's Library(n)

programme.title: Tin Cup
programme.desc: Romantic sports comedy about a washed-up golfer who tries to get back into the big game, having previously ruined his career when he was disqualified. Now making ends meet as a teacher at a shabby Texas driving range, his life is changed when he falls for a beautiful psychologist. He decides that the way to win her is to impress her - by beating her pro-golfer boyfriend and winning the US Open(n)

programme.title: Tin Cup
programme.desc: Romantic sports comedy about a washed-up golfer who tries to get back into the big game, having previously ruined his career when he was disqualified. programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Twelve contestants battle it out to be named best amateur baker of 2014, beginning by tackling a Swiss roll, a cherry cake and miniature British classics. Mel Giedroyc and Sue Perkins present and judges Mary Berry and Paul Hollywood cast a critical eye over the contenders' efforts.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Having shown they have what it takes to bake a cake or two, the 11 remaining contestants turn their attention to biscuits. First up they create their signature savoury crackers for cheese, and are encouraged to push the flavour. In the technical challenge, they have to prepare Mary Berry's Florentines, with their chewy caramel sauce and brandy-snap texture, before ending with a showstopper like no other - three-dimensional scenes made entirely from biscuits. For one hopeful, there will be the pride of being crowned Star Baker, while another will be sent home - well aware that that's just the way the cookie crumbles. Hosted by Mel Giedroyc and Sue Perkins.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: The 10 remaining contestants face three tasks designed to test their bread-making skills, beginning by creating 12 perfect rye bread rolls shaped in any way they like and using as much flour as they dare. For the technical challenge they have to prepare Italian ciabatta using Paul's recipe, before ending with show-stopping centrepiece loaves that will have to make an impact on the table as well as on the judges. Paul Hollywood and Mary Berry then decide which of the contenders will be the week's star baker - and which of them is going home. Mel Giedroyc and Sue Perkins present.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Judges Mary Berry and Paul Hollywood assess the remaining contestants' dessert-making skills, beginning with a signature challenge of a sponge containing a gooey sauce filling or a saucy surprise at the bottom. The technical round involves creating a tiramisu cake, before the contenders have to prepare a baked Alaska for the showstopper. Plus, presenter Sue Perkins explores the origins of Paignton pudding, a heavyweight version of which caused a riot in the Devon town in 1859.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: After last week's baked Alaska scandal - which led to Iain hanging up his apron and has since also seen Diana leave the show - judges Mary Berry and Paul Hollywood assess the remaining contestants' pastry skills. They begin with a signature challenge of a sweet custard tart of their own invention, ranging from rhubarb and custard to tropical Manchester tart. The technical round involves recreating Paul's recipe for mini pear pies, followed by their showpiece bake - a towering collection of three-tiered pies in just four hours. Along the way, Mel Giedroyc investigates the history of an ancient wedding centrepiece known as Bride Pie.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: The remaining six bakers have passed the halfway point of the contest, and now face three European bakes - beginning with yeast-leavened cakes, a tricky cross between cake and bread. Mary Berry then sets them the challenge of rustling up a Swedish princess torte, but they have their work cut out completing all 24 stages of the recipe in little more than two hours. They finish by creating their own version of the dobos torte, a multi-layered cake from Hungary. However, they must go one step further and bake a two-tiered version with an emphasis on caramel. Which of the bakers will come to a sticky end?.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Presenters Mel Giedroyc and Sue Perkins set the remaining contestants three tasks involving pastry, beginning by asking them to make signature savoury parcels. For the technical challenge, they must prepare a cake that hails from the Brittany region of France - the kouign amann, which none of the bakers has ever heard of - before creating two different types of eclair in the showstopper round. Mary Berry and Paul Hollywood judge the hopefuls' efforts before deciding who is star baker and who is going home.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: The nation's favourite baking contest has certainly proved it can hold its own after moving to BBC One - this series has been the most entertaining (not to mention contentious) yet. It's about to get a whole lot hotter in the kitchen, though, as it reaches the quarter-final stage, and just five amateur bakers remain. They've all impressed to various extents during Bread Week - at least sufficiently to make it through - but now their skills are thoroughly tested as they take on enriched doughs. They have a signature bake in which they must work with soft dough to create artful works, a technical that sees them recreate an Eastern European cross between bread and pastry, and a showstopper involving doughnuts.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Sue Perkins and Mel Giedroyc present as the remaining four bakers take a deep breath and head into the semi-final of the nation's favourite baking contest. However, there's no time to marvel at how far they've come - it's Patisserie Week, and they will need to demonstrate that they have skills worthy enough to see them through to this year's final. The bakers are challenged to make a signature baklava - two types of any flavour they like, before the technical challenge demands they knock up a German Schichttorte, a cake cooked in stages under the grill to create 20 layers of different coloured sponge. Finally, the showstopper sees the semi-finalists baking non-stop to create two entremets in which they should demonstrate as many personal skills and techniques as they can.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.sub-title: The Great British Bake Off: The Final.
programme.desc: Three contestants remain and only one more weekend of baking stands between them and the 2014 title. Judges Paul Hollywood and Mary Berry have saved their most fiendish tests till last, as the finalists face a Signature Challenge in which they have just three hours to prove they have mastered a pastry technique that usually takes a whole day. They then have to tackle a Technical Challenge without the aid of a recipe, before rustling up a Showstopper that turns sponge, caramel, choux pastry and petits fours into a winning combination. At least Sue Perkins and Mel Giedroyc are on hand to lighten the atmosphere if it all gets too tense.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Twelve contestants battle it out to be named best amateur baker of 2014, beginning by tackling a Swiss roll, a cherry cake and miniature British classics. programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Sue Perkins and Mel Giedroyc present as the remaining four bakers take a deep breath and head into the semi-final of the nation's favourite baking contest. However, there's no time to marvel at how far they've come - it's Patisserie Week, and they will need to demonstrate that they have skills worthy enough to see them through to this year's final. The bakers are challenged to make a signature baklava - two types of any flavour they like, before the technical challenge demands they knock up a German Schichttorte, a cake cooked in stages under the grill to create 20 layers of different coloured sponge. Finally, the showstopper sees the semi-finalists baking non-stop to create two entremets in which they should demonstrate as many personal skills and techniques as they can.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.sub-title: The Great British Bake Off: The Final.
programme.desc: Three contestants remain and only one more weekend of baking stands between them and the 2014 title. Judges Paul Hollywood and Mary Berry have saved their most fiendish tests till last, as the finalists face a Signature Challenge in which they have just three hours to prove they have mastered a pastry technique that usually takes a whole day. They then have to tackle a Technical Challenge without the aid of a recipe, before rustling up a Showstopper that turns sponge, caramel, choux pastry and petits fours into a winning combination. At least Sue Perkins and Mel Giedroyc are on hand to lighten the atmosphere if it all gets too tense.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Kitchen Notebook
programme.sub-title: Rachel Khoo's Kitchen Notebook: London: Nostalgia.
programme.desc: The chef takes a trip down memory lane as she relives her youthful love for ice-cream, before making a strudel - one of her family's favourite dishes.(n)

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Kitchen Notebook
programme.sub-title: Rachel Khoo's Kitchen Notebook: London: Fast Food.
programme.desc: The chef explores the capital's fast-food scene, and demonstrates how one quick bread recipe can cater for breakfast, lunch and dinner.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: You Gotta Eat Here
programme.desc: Host John Catucci visits Calgary's Oak Tree Tavern for some pub-style home cooking, and embraces Malaysian cuisine at Montreal's Satay Brothers.(n)

programme.title: You Gotta Eat Here
programme.desc: John Catucci stops in at Calgary's Pig & Duke for bacon-loaded meatloaf, and Everett in Washington's Kama'aina Grinz for Hawaiian specialties like loco moco.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: The remaining contestants' pie-making skills are put to the test in a trio of demanding tasks. First, the hopefuls try to impress judges Paul Hollywood and Mary Berry by making beef Wellington, before creating hand-raised pies during this round's technical challenge - but several of the cooks run into difficulties as they try to work with a pastry dolly for the first time. Finally, the showstopper challenge sees traditional American pies being prepared - before one more baker is eliminated from the competition. From 2012.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: Part two of two. The second heat is a longer-than-usual edition, which sees another group of hopeful cooks taking on the Invention Test - creating what the contestants hope will be an amazing plate of food in just one hour - followed by the Palate Test. This new challenge sees them use their sense of taste and smell to determine the ingredients in a pigeon Wellington with glazed shallots and then recreate it without a recipe. Those lucky enough not to be sent home will then get their first experience of a professional kitchen - London's Caxton Grill - where the heat is really on. Will it stand any of them in good stead for the final round, after which judges John Torode and Gregg Wallace decide who stays and who goes?.(n)

programme.title: The Hairy Bikers' Cookbook
programme.sub-title: Si and Dave Do Transylvania - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Si King and Dave Myers take a trip through Romania, where they explore Bucharest's markets and eat pancakes on the roof of the Ministry of Finance. They also visit the imposing Corvin Castle, where they cook pork sarmales by the drawbridge.(n)

programme.title: The Hairy Bikers' Cookbook
programme.sub-title: Si and Dave Do Transylvania - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Si King and Dave Myers meet a woman who makes chicken noodle soup by royal appointment, and prepare chicken paprikas and spaetzles in the hills. They then head north to the Ukrainian border, where they sample Romanian sausages and ewe's milk pudding.(n)

programme.title: James Martin: Home Comforts
programme.desc: The chef continues his demonstrations of home cooking as he puts together a selection of meals using leftover food, which he believes will taste even better the second time around. With Ivan Day.(n)

programme.title: River Cottage
programme.desc: Hugh Fearnley-Whittingstall's vegetable patch is invaded by slugs, jeopardising his plans to provide a meat-free wedding banquet. He also meets Leicester restaurateur Jagdish Ghelani, who demonstrates a selection of south Asian dishes, and prepares stuffed courgette flowers and an aubergine and bean curry.(n)

programme.title: Saving My Tomorrow
programme.desc: Part Two. Part 2 of 6. A celebration of the natural world features children's thoughts on the environment, endangered animals and climate change. Also: readings by Susan Sarandon and Neil deGrasse Tyson; performances by Ziggy Marley, Willie Nelson and They Might Be Giants; remarks by scientists from the American Museum of Natural History(n)

programme.title: The Family Man
programme.desc: Wall Street Banker Jack Campbell has it all: more cash than he can shake a stick at, oodles of power and, above all, his freedom. But on Christmas Eve he challenges an armed robber, then on Christmas Day he wakes up to the life he would have had if he'd stayed with his college girlfriend: two noisy kids, a dead-end job selling tyres, and a people carrier instead of his Ferrari. At first he's horrified..(n)

programme.title: Joy
programme.desc: The tumultuous life of entrepreneur Joy Mangano, a divorced mother of two who risked her life's savings to produce and market her invention of the Miracle Mop. The success of that invention sparked her television-shopping business empire(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Gifted'
programme.desc: A look at "Gifted," a 2017 drama about a man doing his best to raise his 7-year-old niece, whose emergence as a math prodigy leads to a custody battle between the man and his mother. The film stars Chris Evans, Mckenna Grace and Lindsay Duncan, and is directed Marc Webb(n)

programme.title: The Last Witch Hunter
programme.desc: An immortal witch hunter faces off against the Queen Witch who has returned from the dead in a battle where the fate of humanity hangs in the balance(n)

programme.title: The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants 2
programme.desc: The 2008 sequel to the female buddy film The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants constitutes an adaptation of Ann Brashares' novel Forever in Blue: The Fourth Summer of the Sisterhood. Like the premier installment, this picture explores the seriocomic events that unfold one summer in the lives of four temporarily estranged friends as an extremely special pair of jeans works its way from one girl to the next. In one subplot, Lena (Alexis Bledel) travels to Providence, RI, and enrolls in a painting course; in another, Bridget (Blake Lively) embarks on an archaeological excavation in Greece; in a third, Carmen (America Ferrera) works on the backstage crew for a Vermont-based theater festival; and in the fourth, Tibby remains in New York and enrolls in summer courses. Sanaa Hamri, best known for her Prince and Mariah Carey music videos, directs; Elizabeth Chandler, who co-scripted the first film, adapts the Brashares book(n)

African-American Jackie Robinson breaks Major League Baseball's colour barrier when he is signed to the Brooklyn Dodgers by the team's forward-thinking general manager, Branch Rickey. The gifted athlete deals with tremendous pressure and threats from racist fans and players, but perseveres to become a legendary baseball player and a heroic figure in American history(n)

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: Twelve-year-old orphan Lyra Belacqua lives in an Oxford college, where the academic and domestic staff do their best to push her enquiring mind down conventional educational routes and quell her tomboy tendencies; it's a losing battle. One day, having sneaked into a private meeting of the college's dons, Lyra learns of mysterious events taking place in the Arctic. Soon after, amid news of mysterious child abductors called the 'Gobblers', her best friend Roger vanishes. The fearless Lyra sets off, determined to rescue her playmate. But Lyra's is a parallel universe: one with VIctorian-style technology; where people's souls take the form of character-suggesting visible animals; witches and talking, armoured polar bears rule the cold lands of the north; and an organisation called The Magisterium aims to assert its authority over everyone. Lyra's journey will prove a dangerous one; one that uncovers the terrible truth that links the Gobblers and the Arctic phenomenon she heard about in the safety of Oxford. Also starring Eva Green, and the voices of Freddie Highmore and Ian McKellen. Sadly, it now looks as though the following two films in the series are fated not to be made. Even so, this stands as a stirring, thoughtful family adventure that's reasonably true to Pullman's masterpiece(n)

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: Two straight-laced friends pose as drug dealers and try their best -- and sometimes fail -- to fit in with the thug circle in order to retrieve a stolen kitten(n)

programme.title: Saving My Tomorrow
programme.desc: Part Two. Part 2 of 6. A celebration of the natural world features children's thoughts on the environment, endangered animals and climate change. Also: readings by Susan Sarandon and Neil deGrasse Tyson; performances by Ziggy Marley, Willie Nelson and They Might Be Giants; remarks by scientists from the American Museum of Natural History(n)

programme.title: The Family Man
programme.desc: Wall Street Banker Jack Campbell has it all: more cash than he can shake a stick at, oodles of power and, above all, his freedom. But on Christmas Eve he challenges an armed robber, then on Christmas Day he wakes up to the life he would have had if he'd stayed with his college girlfriend: two noisy kids, a dead-end job selling tyres, and a people carrier instead of his Ferrari. At first he's horrified..(n)

programme.title: Joy
programme.desc: The tumultuous life of entrepreneur Joy Mangano, a divorced mother of two who risked her life's savings to produce and market her invention of the Miracle Mop. The success of that invention sparked her television-shopping business empire(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Gifted'
programme.desc: A look at "Gifted," a 2017 drama about a man doing his best to raise his 7-year-old niece, whose emergence as a math prodigy leads to a custody battle between the man and his mother. The film stars Chris Evans, Mckenna Grace and Lindsay Duncan, and is directed Marc Webb(n)

programme.title: The Last Witch Hunter
programme.desc: An immortal witch hunter faces off against the Queen Witch who has returned from the dead in a battle where the fate of humanity hangs in the balance(n)

programme.title: The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants 2
programme.desc: The 2008 sequel to the female buddy film The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants constitutes an adaptation of Ann Brashares' novel Forever in Blue: The Fourth Summer of the Sisterhood. Like the premier installment, this picture explores the seriocomic events that unfold one summer in the lives of four temporarily estranged friends as an extremely special pair of jeans works its way from one girl to the next. In one subplot, Lena (Alexis Bledel) travels to Providence, RI, and enrolls in a painting course; in another, Bridget (Blake Lively) embarks on an archaeological excavation in Greece; in a third, Carmen (America Ferrera) works on the backstage crew for a Vermont-based theater festival; and in the fourth, Tibby remains in New York and enrolls in summer courses. Sanaa Hamri, best known for her Prince and Mariah Carey music videos, directs; Elizabeth Chandler, who co-scripted the first film, adapts the Brashares book(n)

African-American Jackie Robinson breaks Major League Baseball's colour barrier when he is signed to the Brooklyn Dodgers by the team's forward-thinking general manager, Branch Rickey. The gifted athlete deals with tremendous pressure and threats from racist fans and players, but perseveres to become a legendary baseball player and a heroic figure in American history(n)

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: Twelve-year-old orphan Lyra Belacqua lives in an Oxford college, where the academic and domestic staff do their best to push her enquiring mind down conventional educational routes and quell her tomboy tendencies; it's a losing battle. One day, having sneaked into a private meeting of the college's dons, Lyra learns of mysterious events taking place in the Arctic. Soon after, amid news of mysterious child abductors called the 'Gobblers', her best friend Roger vanishes. The fearless Lyra sets off, determined to rescue her playmate. But Lyra's is a parallel universe: one with VIctorian-style technology; where people's souls take the form of character-suggesting visible animals; witches and talking, armoured polar bears rule the cold lands of the north; and an organisation called The Magisterium aims to assert its authority over everyone. Lyra's journey will prove a dangerous one; one that uncovers the terrible truth that links the Gobblers and the Arctic phenomenon she heard about in the safety of Oxford. Also starring Eva Green, and the voices of Freddie Highmore and Ian McKellen. Sadly, it now looks as though the following two films in the series are fated not to be made. Even so, this stands as a stirring, thoughtful family adventure that's reasonably true to Pullman's masterpiece(n)

programme.desc: A look at "The Zookeeper's Wife," a 2017 drama based on Diane Ackerman's nonfiction book about a couple who used the Warsaw Zoo to save hundreds of Jews during the German occupation of Poland during World War II. The film stars Jessica Chastain, Johan Heldenbergh and Daniel Brühl, and is directed by Niki Caro(n)

programme.title: The Number 23
programme.desc: Affable everyman Walter Sparrow is given a second-hand detective novel 'The Number 23' for his birthday, but grows increasingly obsessed with the parallels he sees between his life and that of the book's protagonist(n)

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: Perceptive comedy-drama following the ups and downs of the parent-child relationships within a large family. An over-protective dad - determined to do a better job than his own distant father - anxiously dotes on his troubled, eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his three-year-old daughter into an academic high-flyer but neglects his wife; and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers(n)

programme.title: Welcome Home Roscoe Jenkins
programme.desc: Tale about a successful self-help guru and TV talk-show host who gets mixed up in a series of comic disasters when he goes home to Georgia for his parents' 50th wedding anniversary(n)

programme.title: Midnight Special
programme.desc: In this captivating sci-fi adventure, Roy rescues his son Alton from a cult in Texas, whose members worship the boy for his supernatural powers. Along with a state trooper, the pair go on a cross-country journey as they are hunted by federal agents, who believe Alton might be a threat to national security(n)

programme.title: Rushmore
programme.desc: Wes Anderson's quirky comedy-drama, scripted by Anderson and Owen Wilson (their follow-up to the equally delightful Bottle Rocket), stars Jason Schwartzman as Max Fischer, a scholarship student at the exclusive Rushmore Academy who compensates for his feelings of inadequacy by organising a host of school societies. But when he falls for his teacher, Rosemary Cross, things get messy, and are further complicated when he finds out that she is having an affair with a rich parent, Herman Blume, who happens to be Max's hero and mentor. So begins a battle of wills between Max and Herman..(n)

programme.title: Unbreakable
programme.desc: Screenwriter-director M. Night Shyamalan's thriller about a security guard who thinks he may have special powers after surviving a horrific train wreck(n)

programme.title: Neighbors 2: Sorority Rising
programme.desc: Young parents Mac and Kelly find that their neighbor troubles are far from over when a hedonistic sorority moves in next door just as they're about to sell their house. During their feud with the ladies, the couple team up with ex-fratboy Teddy, who tormented them the last time around(n)

programme.title: Steve Jobs
programme.desc: This incisive biographical drama written by Aaron Sorkin (The West Wing) explores the genius and shortcomings of computing guru Steve Jobs (Michael Fassbender) through the lens of three product launches(n)

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: The Book of Kevin. Season 3 begins three years after the Guilty Remnant descended on Miracle, Texas, where Kevin is now chief of police, a job that isn't made any easier by the fact that the seventh anniversary of the Sudden Departure is two weeks away, and many citizens are convinced that another apocalyptic event is in the offing(n)

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: Two daffy adult sisters, one an irresponsible single mom and the other a kindhearted nurse, decide to throw one last wild party at their childhood home before it's sold by their parents. However, their bash ends up going disastrously awry(n)

programme.title: Girls
programme.desc: Latching. Hannah embarks on a new chapter in the series finale(n)

programme.title: Veep
programme.desc: Omaha. In the Season 6 premiere, Selina tries to secure her legacy one year after losing the presidency. Meanwhile, Dan tries to fit in at his new job; and Amy's D.C.-style campaign tactics are a little too rough for her new coworkers(n)

programme.title: J. Cole: 4 Your Eyez Only, A Dreamville Film
programme.desc: A showcase for songs from hip-hop artist J. Cole's fourth studio album, "4 Your Eyez Only," features music performances and stories of hardship from residents in Baton Rouge, Atlanta, Ferguson, Mo., Fayetteville, N.C., and Jonesboro, Ark(n)

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: The X-Men are forced to confront an ancient mutant called Apocalypse (Oscar Isaac) in this comic-book adventure set in the 1980s. Eager to take over the world and remake it in his own image, Apocalypse recruits mutants to act as his powerful "Four Horsemen" -- among them is the tortured Magneto (Michael Fassbender), who believes humanity might be a lost cause after a personal tragedy. In time, Charles Xavier (James McAvoy) and his charges must work together to save the planet from this threat. New additions to this X-Men team include the elusive Nightcrawler (Kodi Smit-McPhee), fiery Cyclops (Tye Sheridan), and telepathically gifted Jean Grey (Sophie Turner). Rose Byrne, Jennifer Lawrence, and Olivia Munn co-star(n)

programme.title: Resident Evil
programme.desc: Leaks in an underground lab cause slaughter when the lab's defence mechanisms turn the researchers into zombies. Commandos are sent in to shut the place down, but discover only cannibals driven by their hunger for human flesh(n)

programme.title: Baby Mama
programme.desc: Successful and single businesswoman Kate Holbrook is finally determined to have a kid on her own now that she is 37. But when she discovers that she has only a million-to-one chance of getting pregnant, the driven Kate finds in working girl Angie Ostrowiski an unlikely surrogate. Everything is apparently going well. That until Angie shows up at Kate doorstep with no place to live. The two opposites try to get along and, in the middle of their tug-of-war, they discover that there can be a different kind of family(n)

programme.title: Genius
programme.desc: Colin Firth stars in this biopic of famous literary editor Max Perkins, which centers on his personal and professional relationship with eccentric author Thomas Wolfe (Jude Law). As Wolfe becomes consumed with his lengthy novels and begins to alienate his lover Aline Bernstein (Nicole Kidman), Perkins struggles to reel in his talent in order to deliver another best-seller for Scribner Publishing during the 1930s. Laura Linney, Guy Pearce, and Dominic West co-star in director Michael Grandage's debut feature film(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords
programme.desc: The New Cup. Bret's impulsive purchase of a new teacup sets off a string disastrous consequences that could jeopardize the future of the band, and causes Jemaine to seek extreme methods of earning income(n)

programme.title: The Conspirator
programme.desc: Lawyer Frederick Aiken defends Mary Surratt from charges of participating in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln, and realises that she's being used as bait to capture her son, the only conspirator to have eluded justice(n)

programme.title: The Secret Life of Bees
programme.desc: Drama starring Queen Latifah and Dakota Fanning, set in South Carolina during the turbulent struggle for civil rights in the early 60s. Fourteen-year-old Lily Owens is seeking to escape the clutches of her abusive father and find some relief from the haunting memories of her mother's death. In her attempt to find peace, she flees to the comforting, supportive, empowering environment created by August Boatwright and her sisters, May, and June. There, she finds a sense of purpose in looking after the sisters' bees, romance with local boy Zach and a fuller understanding of her mother's past(n)

programme.title: The English Patient
programme.desc: Beginning in the 1930's, The English Patient tells the story of Count Almásy who is a Hungarian map maker employed by the Royal Geographical Society to chart the vast expanses of the Sahara Desert along with several other prominent explorers. As World War II unfolds, Almásy enters into a world of love, betrayal, and politics that is later revealed in a series of flashbacks while Almásy is on his death bed after being horribly burned in a plane crash(n)

programme.title: Live Free or Die Hard
programme.desc: In the rollicking, stunt-filled fourth installment in the popular franchise, gung-ho cop John McClane goes interface to interface with technoterrorists plotting to hack into government computers and bring the country to a standstill(n)

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: Chaos reigns when a virus starts turning humans into blood-crazed predators. An alternate ending follows the film. Strong language/strong bloody violence/flashing images(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.desc: Trans Youth. Transgender youth and difficult decisions about medical transitions faced by them and their parents are examined(n)

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: 04-16-2017. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Now You See Me 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, illusionists known as the Four Horsemen return to perform a spectacular stunt in the hopes of clearing their name and exposing the unscrupulous behavior of a tech mogul(n)

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.desc: A talk show about current events with the former host of 'Politically Incorrect.' This weekly late-night forum is a virtual clone of 'P.I.,' with some Maher stand-up and a similarly diverse lineup of informed panelists, but this being HBO, the language is a good deal more blunt. In addition to the roundtable discussions, the show also features topical interviews with in-studio and satellite guests(n)

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: The Book of Kevin. Season 3 begins three years after the Guilty Remnant descended on Miracle, Texas, where Kevin is now chief of police, a job that isn't made any easier by the fact that the seventh anniversary of the Sudden Departure is two weeks away, and many citizens are convinced that another apocalyptic event is in the offing(n)

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: A superteam of vicious criminals including The Joker, Harley Quinn and Deadshot are recruited to embark on a suicide mission for the benefit of a government agency(n)

programme.title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
programme.desc: In desperate need of a vacation after being unceremoniously dumped by his TV-star girlfriend, a man travels to a lavish Hawaiian resort to nurse his wounds and forget his heartache, only to discover that his ex and her handsome new boyfriend are currently staying at the exact same island hot spot. Peter Bretter (Jason Segel) may be just another struggling musician, but for the past six years he's been dating Sarah Marshall (Kristen Bell), one of the hottest stars on television. Sarah is everything in the world to Peter, so when she kindly but firmly tells him that they should each go their separate ways, he is absolutely devastated. Later, after attempting to salvage his ego by awkwardly attempting to become a womanizer and nearly losing his job because of a nervous breakdown, an emotionally fragile Peter attempts to put the past behind him by escaping to the sun-soaked beaches of Oahu. While at first it seems as if Peter has discovered the perfect prescription for a bad case of lost love, his plan soon turns to dust when Sarah and her new rock-star boyfriend, Aldous (Russell Brand), turn up at the exact same resort. Though accepting Sarah's lavish new lifestyle won't be easy for the crestfallen Peter, the laid-back companionship of flirtatious resort employee Rachel (Mila Kunis) -- not to mention a continuous regimen of fruity cocktails -- goes a long way in mending the wounds of a broken heart. Forgetting Sarah Marshall was penned by Segel and produced by Judd Apatow. Fun with Dick and Jane screenwriter Nicholas Stoller makes his directorial debut. The cast also includes Paul Rudd, Bill Hader, Jack McBrayer, and Jonah Hill(n)

programme.title: Cloud Atlas
programme.desc: Tom Hanks and Halle Berry star in this sci-fi epic weaving together six stories set in the past, present and future. Strong language/strong violence/sex/flashing images(n)
