programme.title: Out of the Furnace
programme.desc: Gritty drama starring Christian Bale as a man whose brother disappears when he gets mixed up with a violent crime ring(n)

programme.title: Lost Highway
programme.desc: David Lynch's surreal thriller stars Bill Pullman as saxophonist Fred Madison who dreams he and his wife Renée (Patricia Arquette) are being watched by a strange man while they sleep. When Renée is killed, Fred ends up on Death Row, only to disappear himself, replaced in his cell by innocent motor mechanic Pete Dayton (Balthazar Getty). On release, Dayton is approached by gangster Dick Laurent (Robert Loggia) and his mistress (Arquette in a second role) who offer him work. Slowly Dayton and Madison's paths start to cross(n)

programme.title: Nick Cannon: Stand Up, Don't Shoot
programme.desc: Comedian Nick Cannon discusses the controversial times we're living in and how getting old affects his dating in a stand-up routine. Plus, Nick offers scoop on how a trip to Australia was the straw that broke apart his marriage to Mariah Carey. Filmed live at the Ebony Repertory Theatre in South Central Los Angeles(n)

programme.title: Martin Lawrence: Doin' Time: Uncut
programme.desc: Comedian Martin Lawrence returns to the stand-up stage for a night of impressions and insight on everything from sex, relationships and President Obama to Bill Cosby, Hollywood and more. Filmed live at the Orpheum Theatre in Los Angeles(n)

programme.title: The Spirit
programme.desc: A murdered cop mysteriously returns from the dead and sets out to clean up the streets of crime-ravaged Central City, locking horns with a vicious villain knows as The Octopus(n)

programme.title: Stolen
programme.desc: This rousing crime thriller follows an ex-con as he pulls off one last heist in order to pay his daughter's kidnapper, who mistakenly believes he possesses $10 million worth of stolen bonds(n)

programme.title: Zero Days
programme.desc: This riveting documentary about cyberwarfare explores how a computer virus called Stuxnet, which was allegedly created by the United States and Israel to shut down an Iranian nuclear facility, has ushered in a new era of international conflict(n)

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: The story of a police robot named Chappie, who develops the ability to think and feel for himself. As people fight back against the mechanised police force, sinister forces seek to capture Chappie for their nefarious purposes(n)

programme.title: Larry the Cable Guy: Health Inspector
programme.desc: A laid-back health inspector's comfortable routine receives an unwelcome shake up when he's assigned the task of training his new rookie partner and investigating the outbreak of a mysterious illness at one of the city's most posh restraints in this no-holds-barred comedy starring Blue Collar standup king Larry the Cable Guy. It's all greasy spoons and low-rent ethnic eateries in the world of seasoned big-city health inspector Larry (Larry the Cable Guy), and that's just the way he likes it. After begrudgingly accepting the task of training by-the-books trainee Amy (Iris Bahr), Larry lands the biggest case of his career when a group of high-class diners fall ill following a particularly pricey meal. Though the gruff but lovable health inspector soon loses his job as a direct result of his questionable manners, he soon wins the heart of a shy waitress while attempting to go undercover to crack the case and ensure that the conspirators who engineered the poisonous plan are brought to justice(n)

programme.title: American Heart
programme.desc: Following up on Streetwise, his powerful documentary on the homeless kids of Seattle, director Martin Bell returned to that city for a dramatic feature. Nick Kelson (Edward Furlong) is a troubled teenager whose mother has been dead for many years; he spends much of his time with other throwaway kids roaming the city. When Nick's father Jack (Jeff Bridges) is released from a long stretch in prison, the father and child reunion is a bumpy one. Jack senses an obligation to his son but is trying to focus on taking responsibility for his own life before he can extend himself. Nick is wary of his father's criminal background, but he also craves the stability of a real home life. Aware that a return to the city whose mean streets spawned his criminal career might pull him back into his old ways, Jack talks about moving to Alaska to make a fresh start, but it's not clear if Nick is part of his plan. The film's unsentimental look at its characters always on the verge of backsliding didn't endear it to ticket buyers, but it was lauded by many critics for its honesty and for Bridges' strong performance, which won an Independent Spirit award(n)

programme.title: Dead Heat
programme.desc: Retired Boston policeman Pally (Kiefer Sutherland) finds himself mired in murder, mobsters, and misfired romance when he well-meaningly agrees to help his stepbrother, Ray (Anthony LaPaglia), finance a long-shot racehorse. A mob kingpin (Daniel Benzali) has his eyes on the nag as well, and he exploits a debt by a lowlife jockey (Lothaire Bluteau) to take control of the horse. Naturally, it all comes down to the Big Race, and it seems no matter where the horse finishes, Pally's going to be a loser(n)

Caan runs a company that has lucrative contracts to repair New York's subway trains but he also has to make sure the opposition are seen in a bad light and that means employing Joaquin Phoenix, Wahlberg's best friend, to undertake a little sabotage. As Wahlberg gets sucked into the criminal underworld surrounding the repair yards and violence explodes, so he finds himself a target for the police - and his uncle, who needs to guarantee his silence(n)

programme.title: Good Kill
programme.desc: Andrew Niccol's 21st century war drama Good Kill stars Ethan Hawke as Air Force Major Thomas Egan, a talented pilot who spends his days operating a drone over various terrorist threats in the middle east while sitting in a trailer on a base in Las Vegas. Egan hates not being allowed to fly actual planes anymore, and as the CIA begins dictating orders to Egan and his crew, he begins to feel morally disconnected from his job. This leads to more conflict at home with his wife (January Jones), who wishes her husband could focus on their family as much as his military duty. Good Kill screened at the 2014 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Adam Sandler's second popular starring vehicle after Billy Madison is a goofy lowbrow paean to golf, hockey, and the comic hysterics of its childlike star. In Happy Gilmore, Sandler plays the title character, a raw, determined, but ultimately untalented hockey player who keeps trying out for the pros. When Happy discovers his grandmother (Frances Bay) will lose her home if she doesn't fork over 270,000 dollars to the IRS, he tries to figure out how he can possibly scrounge up the cash. An idea strikes during a game of one-upmanship with a couple furniture movers stripping his grandmother's home: On his first-ever swing, he drives a golf ball farther than the movers have ever seen. Before long, he has transplanted the foul-mouthed, aggressive persona of the hockey rink to the links, winning an amateur tourney that earns him a spot on the pro tour. Throttling everyone from a helpless caddy to game show host Bob Barker during the course of his 90-day quest to amass prize money, Happy also wins the sport a legion of new fans with his in-your-face style. Guiding him on his quest is a whimsical retired pro who lost his hand to an alligator (Carl Weathers) and an attractive public relations woman charmed by Happy's antics (Julie Bowen). Opposing him, however, is sneering hotshot Shooter McGavin (Christopher McDonald), who will do anything to win his championship jacket and see Happy fail(n)

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
programme.desc: An ordinary mall cop becomes a hero when he saves the day by stopping some goons from robbing the mall(n)

programme.title: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry
programme.desc: Comedy about two straight New York firemen who hatch a plan to scam extra benefits by entering into a civil partnership together. However, with a city investigator checking on the strength of their relationship, will they be able to maintain their charade when one of them falls for a sexy lawyer?(n)

programme.title: Smashed
programme.desc: A married couple find their love affair with alcohol threatening to unravel their relationship when the time comes to confront their addiction head on. Charlie (Aaron Paul) and Kate (Mary Elizabeth Winstead) are a fun-loving couple, but their heavy drinking is starting to become a problem. As Kate constructs a series of elaborate lies to conceal her addiction from her co-workers, her relationship with her mother begins to deteriorate. Realizing that she needs to get sober in order to pull out of her downward spiral, she finds that Charlie is reluctant to join her, and starts to see their relationship in a new light. Meanwhile, once she gathers the courage to set the bottle aside, the real fight begins. Octavia L. Spencer, Nick Offerman, and Megan Mullally co-star(n)

programme.title: Concussion
programme.desc: This sports-drama centers on the research conducted by forensic neuropathologist that raised public awareness about Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy resulting from such high-impact sports as professional football(n)

programme.desc: The life and music of legendary jazz trumpeter Miles Davis is chronicled in this biopic(n)

programme.title: Trainspotting
programme.desc: A Scottish heroin addict tries to kick the habit, but struggles because of out-of-control mates(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn's Finest

programme.title: American Romance
programme.desc: After their car breaks down in a rural area, giddy newlyweds Jeff and Krissy encounter a deranged truck driver-turned-serial killer whose life was shattered when his son was killed in an accident(n)

programme.title: Enchanted
programme.desc: In Enchanted, a classic Disney fairytale collides with modern-day New York City. An inspiring story about a fairytale princess who is sent to our world by an evil queen. Soon after her arrival, Princess Giselle begins to change her views on life and love after meeting a handsome lawyer. Can a storybook view of romance survive in the real world?(n)

programme.title: Hart's War
programme.desc: Arriving in a German POW camp, Lt Thomas Hart is forced to defend himself and two black officers. After one of the pair is shot for concealing a weapon, the other is found standing over the dead body of the camp scrounger. Hart stands up for him in a court-martial. Was it murder, or was he framed?(n)

programme.title: Dead Man Walking
programme.desc: Dead Man Walking is the compelling true story based on the experience of Sister Helen Prejean, a Catholic nun caught in a moral crisis; her role as a spiritual advisor to a convicted murderer on death row leads her to become an outspoken advocate against the death penalty, but her confrontation with the grieving families of his victims throws her into a deeper crisis of faith than she could ever have imagined(n)

programme.title: Aloha
programme.desc: In this hilarious romantic comedy, a military-defense contractor is rehired by his former boss to oversee the launch of a satellite in Hawaii. He reconnects with an old flame while there, but finds himself increasingly drawn to an Air Force pilot assigned to watch over him(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In a world where the dinosaurs never went extinct, a young Apatosaurus is swept away by a vicious river current and ends up far from home. He soon embarks on a journey to reunite with his family, and befriends a prehistoric human child along the way(n)

programme.title: College Road Trip
programme.desc: Girls just want to have fun in this family comedy, which pairs Martin Lawrence and Raven-Symone as an insanely overprotective father and his college-bound daughter. She wants to attend school halfway across the country and he wants her close to home, but dad's schemes to sabotage her dreams land them in one mess after another. Donny Osmond, Kym E. Whitley, Brenda Song(n)

programme.desc: A small-town DJ grows a pair of horns, which have the power to force other people to act out their desires. He soon uses his new abilities to hunt down his girlfriend's killer(n)

programme.title: The Fifth Element
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure set in the 23rd century in which a jaded New York cab driver finds himself in the middle of a battle between good and evil when a beautiful young woman falls into his life from another dimension. programme.desc: The first misadventure of bumbling Inspector Clouseau sees the French sleuth on the trail of a notorious jewel thief known simply as 'The Phantom'. Comedy(n)

programme.title: The Rewrite

programme.title: The Interpreter
programme.desc: When a United Nations interpreter overhears a plot to assassinate the leader of an African state, a Secret Service agent is assigned to investigate. As the agent delves deeper into the allegation, he discovers that the interpreter has a murky past and begins to doubt her story(n)

programme.desc: After an accident involving his pimp and an overly-aggressive dolphin, reluctant escort Deuce heads to Amsterdam. There he finds himself in danger from a mysterious gigolo killer. Comedy(n)

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Based on actual events, ¿Valkyrie¿ goes back to the Nazi Germany during WWII as the tide turns in favor of the Allies. A proud military man, Colonel Claus von Stauffenberg (Tom Cruise) desperately plots to topple the Nazi regime before the nation is crushed in a near-inevitable defeat. Realizing that time is running out, he decides that he must take action himself and joins the German resistance. Armed with a cunning strategy to use Hitler's own emergency plan - known as Operation Valkyrie - von Stauffenberg and his men plot to assassinate the dictator and overthrow his Nazi government from the inside(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: A female-led reboot of the classic franchise(n)

programme.desc: Steve Martin plays Bobby Bowfinger, a would-be movie producer and charlatan who desperately needs a hit film to repay his debts. programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: Thrilling special effects highlight Mimi Leder's tale of a massive comet headed for Earth. An ambitious journalist (Tea Leoni), investigating what she believes is a Washington sex scandal, discovers that a comet is going to hit Earth. While a team of scientists struggles to alter its course, families prepare for the end. Robert Duvall, Vanessa Redgrave, Morgan Freeman, Leelee Sobieski(n)

programme.title: Billionaire Ransom
programme.desc: A group of young students born with a silver spoon have been sent by their parents to participate in a boot camp that aims to instil responsibility for their lives, but they've been taken as captives by a group of kidnappers for ransom and they must now work together to fight off the kidnappers(n)

programme.title: Wild Hogs
programme.desc: A mismatched group of bored suburbanites longing to escape the stress of their daily lives and embrace the freedom of the open road finds that it takes more than polished chrome and leather jackets to truly experience the biker lifestyle in this revved-up road comedy starring John Travolta, Tim Allen, Martin Lawrence, and William H. Macy. Upon trading the comfort of their couches for the thunderous rumble of two-wheeled street machines, these four adventurous riders cross paths with the notorious Del Fuegos -- an authentic biker gang that doesn't take kindly to the weekend warrior type(n)

programme.desc: Barry W Blaustein's comedy, produced by the Farrelly Brothers, stars Johnny Knoxville as Steve Barker, a low level executive who needs to raise money for his uninsured gardener, who was crippled in an accident. Steve's uncle Gary, who is in debt to the mob, has an idea that will solve both their problems: Steve will enter and win at the Special Olympics and Gary will make a fortune betting on him. Feigning learning difficulties, Steve, now calling himself Jeffy Dahmer, joins the team, but his fellow competitors aren't fooled for a moment. Admiring his chutzpah, they keep quiet, and Jeffy also embarks on a romance with volunteer Lynn Sheridan. What could have been an exercise in poor taste rises above it because it treats the characters with both affection and respect, showing the Special Olympians as engaging and humorous individuals and largely poking fun at Gary and Steve(n)

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: Aliens ask the unemployed actors of a cancelled science-fiction series to help them win an intergalactic war in this comedy(n)

programme.title: Never Back Down
programme.desc: After moving to Florida, a rebellious Iowa teen gets mixed up in an underground fighting league and is mentored by a mixed-martial-arts master. Sean Faris and Amber Heard star in this knockout drama. Cam Gigandet, Evan Peters, Leslie Hope, Djimon Hounsou. Directed by Jeff Wadlow(n)

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: Thrilling special effects highlight Mimi Leder's tale of a massive comet headed for Earth. An ambitious journalist (Tea Leoni), investigating what she believes is a Washington sex scandal, discovers that a comet is going to hit Earth. While a team of scientists struggles to alter its course, families prepare for the end. Robert Duvall, Vanessa Redgrave, Morgan Freeman, Leelee Sobieski(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: Docudrama about the controversial 2004 "60 Minutes" exposé on US President George W Bush's military service, and the fallout that producer Mary Mapes and anchor Dan Rather suffered after questions were raised about the validity of key documents in the report(n)

programme.title: The Rolling Stones: Rock and Roll Circus
programme.desc: A star-studded rock concert from December 1968, when the Rolling Stones invited friends and guests to perform a one-off show in a circus tent. With performances by Jethro Tull, the Who, Taj Mahal and Marianne Faithfull, as well as an appearance by a supergroup, the Dirty Mac, featuring John Lennon, Eric Clapton, Keith Richard, Mitch Mitchell and Yoko Ono. The Stones perform such hits as Jumping Jack Flash and Sympathy for the Devil(n)

programme.title: Eat That Question: Frank Zappa in His Own Words
programme.desc: Exploring the life and career of avant-garde musician Frank Zappa entirely via archival footage of the man, including interviews and concert performances(n)

programme.title: All the King's Men
programme.desc: Sean Penn explodes off the screen in this gripping remake of the 1949 Best Picture Oscar winner. The film chronicles the rise and fall of ruthless Louisiana politician Willie Stark (Penn), who was based on Depression-era demagogue Huey Long. Written and directed by Steve Zaillian, who adapted Robert Penn Warren's 1946 Pulitzer Prize-winning novel. Political consultant James Carville is one of the executive producers. Jude Law, Kate Winslet, Mark Ruffalo, Patricia Clarkson, Anthony Hopkins(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: Docudrama about the controversial 2004 "60 Minutes" exposé on US President George W Bush's military service, and the fallout that producer Mary Mapes and anchor Dan Rather suffered after questions were raised about the validity of key documents in the report(n)

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: Sharp-edged crime thriller in which a London cocaine dealer wants to retire with his millions and his skin intact, but a mob boss has other ideas, dragging him into a set-up involving a missing junkie, a million stolen ecstasy tablets and an East European hitman(n)

programme.title: Fight Club
programme.desc: Edward Norton and Brad Pitt star in David Fincher's Oscar-nominated drama, the former as a bored executive, the latter as a stranger he meets on a plane who introduces him to a world of ennui-alleviating physical pain: Fight Club, a semi-secret organisation where men vent their frustrations in bare knuckle fighting in dingy basements. But as Norton becomes more involved, he learns more about the shadowy organisation that plans to take on more than each other..(n)

programme.title: Saint Laurent
programme.desc: The life of designer Yves Saint Laurent is depicted in this biopic(n)

programme.title: Tumbledown
programme.desc: The grieving widow of a singer-songwriter clashes with an acerbic journalist who arrives in her small Maine town announcing he's writing a biography about her late husband and his mysterious death. What begins as a clash of wills evolves into something more profound, as the journalist's presence helps her make peace with her husband's passing(n)

programme.title: Nick & Norah's Infinite Playlist
programme.desc: Romantic comedy about a young woman (Kat Dennings) who, to put off an annoying classmate, recruits a musician (Michael Cera) to be her boyfriend for an evening that turns out to be quite eventful. Alexis Dziena. Directed by Peter Sollett(n)

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: There's murder, magic, mystery and romance afoot as writer-director Woody Allen heads to London for this beguiling and riotous whodunit. Allen is a magician who's recruited by an American journalism student (Scarlett Johansson) to help solve a crime after a ghost (Ian McShane) tells her that a British aristocrat (Hugh Jackman), with whom she may be falling in love, might actually be a murderer known as "The Tarot Card Killer." Charles Dance, Romola Garai, Julian Glover, Sam Friend(n)

programme.title: Fight Club
programme.desc: Edward Norton and Brad Pitt star in David Fincher's Oscar-nominated drama, the former as a bored executive, the latter as a stranger he meets on a plane who introduces him to a world of ennui-alleviating physical pain: Fight Club, a semi-secret organisation where men vent their frustrations in bare knuckle fighting in dingy basements. But as Norton becomes more involved, he learns more about the shadowy organisation that plans to take on more than each other..(n)

programme.title: Pi
programme.desc: In NYC's Chinatown, math genius Max believes "everything can be understood in terms of numbers" and looks for a pattern in everything as he plays with his advanced computer. Both Wall Street and a Hasidic sect take an interest in his work, but he suffers from blackout attacks and hallucinations(n)

programme.title: Dreaming of Joseph Lees
programme.desc: This drama takes place in Somerset, England in 1958. Eva is a twenty-year-old woman who fantasizes about travel, painting, classic books, and the attention of Joseph Lees, her second cousin, with whom she fell in love as a girl. Joseph, whom she has not seen for four years, is the only member of the family who has managed to get away from the stale domestic cycle. He has recently been injured in a truck accident and Eva imagines herself curing his wounds. She conceals her obsession from everyone except her sister, the precocious Janie, who is twelve years old. Reality is far away from Eva's dreams. Her artistic endeavors are confined to a local drawing class; she works for a meager salary at a dirty sawmill and the only male around to appreciate her female charm is the local pig farmer, Harry Flyte. Harry's sister Maria is anxious to marry off her brother so that she can be free to do as she pleases. Eva moves in with Harry, but when she meets Joseph at a family gathering, the old flame is rekindled. However, Harry is not so easy to get rid of. Dreaming of Joseph Lees is a family drama and the first feature of Eric Styles(n)

programme.title: Jimmy's Hall
programme.desc: In this fascinating drama set in 1932 and based on actual events, Irish political activist Jimmy Gralton reopens a community hall in his hometown with the help of the locals. However, he faces opposition from both the government and a crotchety priest, who suspect the hall is a hotbed for loose morals and communist activity(n)

programme.title: Wolf Totem
programme.desc: In this exciting adventure set in 1960s China, a student from Beijing is sent to teach a nomadic tribe in Mongolia. While there, he cares for and adopts a wolf cub, and their bond causes him to see the world in a new light(n)

programme.title: The Raven
programme.desc: In this spellbinding mystery, horror author Edgar Allan Poe (John Cusack) joins forces with a young Baltimore detective to catch a psychotic serial killer who's obsessed with his stories(n)

programme.title: Saint Laurent
programme.desc: The life of designer Yves Saint Laurent is depicted in this biopic(n)

programme.title: The White Princess
programme.desc: In Bed With the Enemy. Series premiere of a sequel to "The White Queen" chronicles the power grab among the women vying for the English throne(n)

programme.title: Cherish
programme.desc: Shy San Franciscan Zoë is a twenty-something love-starved animator who spends countless hours listening to KXCH Cherish radio, losing herself in a syrupy romantic fantasy of '70s and '80s pop songs. Her mushy world is shattered, however, when a policeman is hit and killed in a mysterious car accident, the assailant flees the scene and Zoë is unfairly left facing a vehicular homicide charge. While awaiting trial, Zoë is confined to house arrest, where she alternates falling in love with her frequent visitor and parole officer, Daly, and trying to prove her innocence to regain her life and freedom(n)

programme.title: Big Fish
programme.desc: A young man returns home for a final meeting with his dying estranged father in a desperate attempt to reconnect with him. A teller of tall tales, the old man regales his son with outlandish stories of himself as a young man and his encounters with a terrifying giant, a one-eyed witch and a duo of singing conjoined twins. But could there be more truth to these stories than first appears?(n)

programme.title: Our Little Sister
programme.desc: At their estranged father's funeral, three twentysomething siblings learn that they have a teenage half sister, and invite her to live with them. In time, her presence forces them to reflect on their own lives and family ties in this heartwarming drama(n)

programme.title: The White Princess
programme.desc: In Bed With the Enemy. Series premiere of a sequel to "The White Queen" chronicles the power grab among the women vying for the English throne(n)

programme.title: Risen
programme.desc: Roman soldier Clavius and his partner Lucius are assigned to squelch an uprising in Jerusalem by locating the crucified body of Jesus Christ. But Clavius soon undergoes a crisis of faith when he witnesses miraculous events during their investigation(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Treasure hunter Benjamin Franklin Gates tries to discover the truth behind the assassination of Abraham Lincoln, by uncovering the mystery within the 18 pages missing from assassin John Wilkes Booth's diary(n)

programme.title: In Her Shoes
programme.desc: Straight-laced Rose breaks off relations with her party girl sister, Maggie, over an indiscretion involving Rose's boyfriend. The chilly atmosphere is broken with the arrival of Ella, the grandmother neither sister knew existed(n)

programme.title: One Fine Day
programme.desc: Two well-off single parents meet, fight, and fall in love in New York City, all while dealing with the problems of raising kids single-handedly(n)

programme.title: The House Bunny
programme.desc: A 27-year-old Playboy bunny who was evicted from Hef's mansion for being too old becomes the housemother at an unpopular sorority and tries to turn its members into the hottest girls on campus. Anna Faris ("Scary Movie") stars in this hilarious farce. Colin Hanks, Emma Stone, Kat Dennings, Dana Goodman, Beverly D'Angelo. Directed by Fred Wolf(n)

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: In this farcical sequel, accomplished mall security guard Paul Blart discovers a heist plot while attending an expo in Las Vegas. His investigative prowess is needed to foil the robbery and arrest those responsible(n)

programme.title: The Hot Chick
programme.desc: Things get hairy for a bratty teen queen named Jessica when magical earrings cause her to switch bodies with a grungy, thirtysomething criminal. The distraught Jessica tries to reverse the spell to get her real body back before prom and a state cheerleading competition(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Treasure hunter Benjamin Franklin Gates tries to discover the truth behind the assassination of Abraham Lincoln, by uncovering the mystery within the 18 pages missing from assassin John Wilkes Booth's diary(n)

programme.title: Moonstruck
programme.desc: When there's a full moon over Brooklyn, anything can happen, and everything happens in the neighborhood where widowed bookkeeper Loretta Castorini (Cher) lives. First, Loretta agrees to marry a man she does not love, Johnny Cammareri (Danny Aiello), simply because he knows how to propose properly. Before the wedding can take place, Cammareri must visit his dying mother in Sicily. In his absence, Loretta is supposed to try to patch up the differences between Johnny and his brother, bakery operator Ronny Cammareri (Nicolas Cage). Having never forgiven Johnny for indirectly causing the accident that crippled him, Ronny flies into a rage whenever his brother's name is mentioned. He does, however, fall for Loretta like a ton of bricks. After a torrid affair, Loretta tries to avoid Ronny out of respect to Johnny, but he's just too fascinating to resist. Meanwhile, Loretta's father (Vincent Gardenia) is fooling around with his mistress Mona (Anita Gillette), while Loretta's mother (Olympia Dukakis) is wooed by a college professor (John Mahoney). These brief flings are forgiven and forgotten, but there's still the delicate situation of Loretta being in love with her future brother-in-law. A now-classic romantic comedy, Moonstruck won Oscars for Cher, Olympia Dukakis, and screenwriter John Patrick Shanley(n)

programme.title: Maggie's Plan
programme.desc: A young woman longing to start a family becomes involved in a complicated love triangle with a struggling novelist co-worker and his haughty theorist wife(n)

programme.title: The Broken Hearts Club: A Romantic Comedy
programme.desc: A gang of pals hang out in the coffee shops of gay West Hollywood, swapping stories and phone numbers. Baseball batter Cole chats up the opposing catcher while he's taking strike, but it's restaurant owner Jack who provides the group's wise head(n)

programme.title: Hysteria
programme.desc: In this sexy, frank comedy set in Victorian London, a young doctor named Mortimer goes to work for an older physician who specializes in treating "hysteria" in women, a condition he cures by manually manipulating them to achieve orgasm. An inventor friend of the young doc creates a device that will perform that service in a quicker fashion. Meanwhile, Mortimer falls in love with the older man's free-spirited, independent-minded daughter(n)

programme.title: Undertaking Betty
programme.desc: A woman whose husband is cheating on her and an undertaker who's in love with her for ages, decide to fake her death so they can be together. However, the other town's undertaker who loves over-the-top funerals complicates things(n)

programme.title: Back to School
programme.desc: A self-made millionaire enrolls in college to get closer to his son. While there, the blunt-speaking blue-collar mogul butts heads with academics, and falls for an attractive English teacher(n)

programme.title: Robert Klein Still Can't Stop His Leg
programme.desc: The life and career of comedian Robert Klein are the focus of this documentary, which includes interviews with Jerry Seinfeld, Jon Stewart, Richard Lewis and more(n)

programme.title: Bull Durham
programme.desc: Comedy drama about a romantic triangle set against the backdrop of minor league baseball. Susan Sarandon is a baseball fan, almost religiously devoted to the sport. Every season, she choses a newcomer to her local team, the Durham Bulls, to sleep with, read poetry to and coach in her own inimitable style. However, this year things are different and she finds herself forced to choose between an undisciplined rookie (Tim Robbins) and a hardened and mature veteran of the game (Kevin Costner)(n)

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral
programme.desc: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love(n)

programme.title: The Hot Chick
programme.desc: Things get hairy for a bratty teen queen named Jessica when magical earrings cause her to switch bodies with a grungy, thirtysomething criminal. The distraught Jessica tries to reverse the spell to get her real body back before prom and a state cheerleading competition(n)

programme.title: Robert Klein Still Can't Stop His Leg
programme.desc: The life and career of comedian Robert Klein are the focus of this documentary, which includes interviews with Jerry Seinfeld, Jon Stewart, Richard Lewis and more(n)

programme.title: The Scout
programme.desc: Comedy drama about a baseball talent scout for the New York Yankees who stumbles across a fantastic talent in the wilds of Mexico - but there's a price to pay for the boy's genius. When the scout witnesses the speed at which the boy can throw a ball, he soon realises he must sign him. But the talented chap reveals that he is psychologically disturbed(n)

programme.title: Beethoven
programme.desc: A family adopts a stray St. Bernard puppy, which grows up to be an obstreperous, slobbering canine, and the target of an evil, animal-research scientist(n)

programme.title: Garfield: A Tail of Two Kitties
programme.desc: Slobby moggy Garfield follows his owner Jon to England where he unwittingly trades places with posh pussy Prince(n)

programme.title: Cheaper by the Dozen 2
programme.desc: A family holiday gets competitive when dad of 12 Tom Baker discovers that his childhood rival has hit the big time and erected a huge holiday home on the same lake. Chaotic family comedy from the director of The Pacifier(n)

programme.title: Back to School
programme.desc: A self-made millionaire enrolls in college to get closer to his son. While there, the blunt-speaking blue-collar mogul butts heads with academics, and falls for an attractive English teacher(n)

programme.title: Sprung
programme.desc: Presented from an African American viewpoint, this romantic comedy chronicles the travails of two best friends in love with two disparate girls. One couple embraces passionate sex while the other prefers traditional romance. Trouble brews when the red-hot lovers conspire to break up the other couple's tiresome relationship(n)

programme.title: Catch .44
programme.desc: Stripper friends Malin Akerman, Nikki Reed and Deborah Ann Woll take on a job for drug baron Bruce Willis that spirals out of control. Crime action with Forest Whitaker(n)

programme.title: She Hate Me
programme.desc: Spike Lee's keen eye for social satire is evident in this comedy about an unemployed executive (Anthony Mackie) who discovers he can make a living impregnating lesbians who want children. Kerry Washington, Ellen Barkin, Monica Bellucci, Jim Brown, Ossie Davis(n)

programme.title: The Way of the Gun
programme.desc: A violent crime thriller from the writer of The Usual Suspects. A pair of criminals (Benicio Del Toro and Ryan Phillippe) kidnap a pregnant woman (Juliette Lewis) who is acting as surrogate mother for a rich and powerful gangster. When their demands for a ransom aren't met, the pair are ruthlessly pursued across Mexico by the gangster's henchmen in a cat-and-mouse chase that leads to a gruesome bloodbath. Who will survive when the bullets start flying? Also stars James Caan and Taye Diggs(n)

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: One of the CIA's finest agents is killed in Prague in the middle of an operation to stop East European terrorists. His identical twin brother, New York ticket scalper Jake Hayes, is recruited to complete the mission. But Jake isn't convinced that suits and guns are his thing. Espionage thriller with a comic edge(n)

programme.title: Heart and Souls
programme.desc: The souls of four bus crash victims enter the body of baby Thomas and watch out for him until he reaches adulthood. To pass through heaven's gates, they need him to conclude their unfinished business on earth. Cue cosmic comedy, with Robert Downey Jr on irresistible form(n)

programme.title: Momentum
programme.desc: An infiltration expert Alex Farraday (Olga Kurylenko) inadvertently gets tangled up in a government conspiracy and is pursued by a deadly assassin (James Purefoy) and his team after she reveals her identity during a routine heist. As Alex attempts to uncover the truth, she utilizes her lethal skills to seek revenge for the murder of her friends. Directed by Stephen S. Campanelli. Cast includes Morgan Freeman, Jenna Saras and Karl Thaning(n)

programme.title: The Constant Gardener
programme.desc: Director Fernando Meirelles expertly crafted this adaptation of John le Carré's best-selling novel exposing political corruption and pharmaceutical company malfeasance in Africa, as encountered by a British diplomat (Ralph Fiennes) and his murdered wife (Rachel Weisz). Bill Nighy, Pete Postlethwaite, Danny Huston, Hubert Kounde, Gerard McSorley, Donald Sumpter, Richard McCabe, Daniele Harford(n)

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: One of the CIA's finest agents is killed in Prague in the middle of an operation to stop East European terrorists. His identical twin brother, New York ticket scalper Jake Hayes, is recruited to complete the mission. But Jake isn't convinced that suits and guns are his thing. Espionage thriller with a comic edge(n)

programme.title: Boiler Room
programme.desc: In this drama that explores greed and corruption in American business, Giovanni Ribisi plays Seth Davis, an intelligent and ambitious college dropout who runs a casino in his apartment. Eager to show his father that he can succeed, Seth lands a job with a small stock brokerage firm. He is given a space in the company's "boiler room," where he makes cold calls to prospective clients. As it turns out, Seth has a genuine talent for cold calling, which gains him the approval of his superiors, the admiration of his father, and the attentions of one of his co-workers, Abby Hilliard (Nia Long). However, the higher up the ladder Seth rises, the deeper he sinks into a quagmire of dirty dealings, until he's breaking the law in order to keep his bosses happy and his paychecks coming. The Boiler Room also features Tom Everett Scott, Scott Caan, Jamie Kennedy, Nicky Katt, and Ben Affleck in a cameo as the headhunter who brings Seth into the firm. Ribisi and Scott also appeared together in That Thing You Do; Ribisi was the drummer replaced by Scott, who then led The One-Ders to fictional pop stardom(n)

programme.desc: Dynamic futuristic thriller based on the classic sci-fi novel. In 2035 Chicago, a homicide cop does not trust the robots that are part of human society. They are supposed to be harmless, but the cop's latest murder hunt unearths a frightening android conspiracy(n)

programme.title: Marley
programme.desc: This documentary profiles influential reggae artist Bob Marley, and includes interviews with those who worked with him and fans who were inspired by his message(n)

programme.title: Jarhead
programme.desc: Gritty Gulf War drama based on a former US Marine's best-selling memoir about his experiences in Saudi Arabia and Kuwait. Anthony 'Swoff' Swofford makes it through boot camp to become a Marine sniper and is sent to Saudi Arabia where he and his unit wait for action. It takes another 175 days of heat, boredom, tension and worries about girlfriends at home before the fighting actually starts. But when it comes, war does not look the way Swoff expects it to(n)

programme.title: Devil
programme.desc: From Executive Producer M. Night Shyamalan comes this thriller about a group of people who become trapped in an elevator and soon realize that one of them is the Devil. What follows is a horrific scenario of claustrophobic suspicion and fear, but unlike other tales of enclosed paranoia, this nightmare is very real. Working from a story by Shyamalan, John Erick Dowdle directs this chilling experience of simple terror(n)

programme.title: On the Edge
programme.desc: Irish psychological drama. A teenage boy becomes suicidal after the death of his alcoholic father, and drives a stolen car over the edge of a cliff. Surviving, he is sent to a mental institution, where he makes a friend and falls in love with a girl as he comes to terms with his feelings(n)

programme.title: The Watcher
programme.desc: James Spader stars as burnt-out FBI agent Joel Campbell, whose attempts to catch a serial killer terrifying Los Angeles end in failure. Moving to Chicago, he seeks psychiatric help from Dr Polly Beilman but then finds his past has come back to haunt him. The killer, David Allen Griffin, has tired of life in the sun and followed him to the Windy City. He taunts Campbell by sending him photographs of the next victim, giving the agent just 24 hours to find them before he kills them. As the murders begin again, Campbell realises he must catch Griffin to lay his own demons to rest, but Griffin's next intended victim is one Campbell knows too well. Joe Charbanic's debut feature is a taut thriller with Spader and Reeves on top form as protagonists who are two sides of the same coin(n)

programme.desc: Jessica Alba stars as Honey Daniels, a dancer and choreographer who struggles to get by until she gets her one big break, but soon she realises that it's too good to be true(n)

programme.desc: A wannabe superhero joins a team of bumbling heroes-in-training on a time-traveling mission to thwart an evil plot in this high-flying comedy featuring Clint Howard, Adam West, Tom Sizemore, and Doug Jones. Ed Gruberman (Justin Whalin) may not possess any actual superpowers, but his passion for fighting crime rivals that of even the greatest comic-book do-gooders. When Ed becomes a member of The Super Capers, an oddball team of aspiring superheroes, it seems as if his dream of fighting crime for real is about to come true. programme.title: Tales from Earthsea
programme.desc: Animator Goro Miyazaki, son of the famous Hayao Miyazaki ("The Walt Disney of Japan"), makes his directorial debut with the animated feature Tales from Earthsea (aka Gedo Senki). Miyazaki loosely adapted the work from the third and fourth volumes in best-selling sci-fi author Ursula K. Le Guin's infamous series of cult novels -- all set in Earthsea, a Tolkien-esque fantasy realm. Gedo Senki opens at a point when Earthsea is deteriorating rapidly, and the power of magic is waning -- tendencies signaled by the sudden, frightening reappearance of dragons in the land of humankind. Ged Sparrowhawk was once a lowly goat herder but is now known as Lord Archmage, the most powerful of all wizards. He soon meets Prince Arren of Enlad -- a teenage boy chased by a "shadow," the force that is tipping the world out of balance and driving innumerable people to the point of insanity. The men team up and journey to Hort Town, the Earthsea capital city, where they find the entire community turned upside down -- craftsmen have abandoned their trades, slavery runs rampant, addicts clamor in the streets. They ultimately find refuge in the priestess Tenar's palace, also occupied by the scarred orphan girl Therru. While the latter initially avoids Arren in fear of his "dark side," Arren bides his time in the nearby fields, being mentored by Ged on the balance of creation. Therru eventually opens up to Arren, but he grows increasingly disturbed by nightmares about being chased by the shadow, and his daytime fear of it grows absolutely overwhelming. Ged then discovers that the cause of the kingdom-wide "imbalance" is actually his old arch nemesis, the wizard Cob, who has opened up the gateway between the living and the dead, and hopes to attain eternal life, meanwhile plotting to murder Ged in vengeance for an act he committed long ago. In fear of his evil self, Arren absconds from Tenar's palace -- actively fleeing from the shadow -- but ultimately faints and turns up at the castle of Cob. The latter's minions give their guest "hazia," which causes him to lose his bearings and tell Cob his real name. Arren thus becomes enslaved to the wizard. Meanwhile, Ged and Therru turn up, and bring Arren back to full awareness. With their assistance, he is able to surmount the temptation of eternal life; he then does an about face, and, with the assistance of an enchanted sword, prepares to do battle with Cob(n)

programme.desc: Step aside Sharktopus, there's a new mutant in the ocean and it's a prehistoric killing machine that's had thousands of years to build up an appetite. Freed from its glacial prison by a sudden climate shift, the Antarctic nightmare quickly makes its way down to Mexico, where the crowded beaches are a virtual buffet for a starving sea monster. As the scenic sands run red with blood and terrified beachcombers flee for their lives, fearless captain Trace (Eric Balfour) and headstrong Marin biologist Carol (Iva Hasperger) quickly realize that the culprit is a creature that could eat Jaws for breakfast. Now, in order to defeat the beast and make the beaches safe again, Trace and Carol will need the help of the world's one and only Dinoshark specialist (Roger Corman). programme.desc: It's a Bundyful Life. In the first episode of a two-part story (originally telecast as a single hour-long entry on the same evening as the debut of The Simpsons), Al (Ed O'Neill) wants to have "The Best Christmas Ever" for the Bundy family. Unfortunately, a few of the shoe-store customers insist upon hanging around after closing time--and as a result, Al arrives too late to withdraw the funds necessary to purchase presents. Meanwhile, Marcy (Amanda Bearse) gets drunk at an office party and leaves a strange "souvenir" at the copying machine. This episode is highlighted by a full-throated performance of "The Bundys' Five Days of Christmas" (no partridges or pear trees in THIS one!)(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: It's a Bundyful Life. In the conclusion of a two-part story(originally telecast as a single hour-long entry on the same evening as the debut of The Simpsons), Al (Ed O'Neill) is unable to raise enough money to buy Christmas presents before him--and in the fine tradtion of George Bailey, he declares that he wishes he were never born. Enter Al's foul-mouthed guardian angel, who looks, sounds and dresses like comedian Sam Kinison. After ranting and railing about his own miserable luck, the Angel shows Al what things would have been like if he wasn't around. In one of the more horrifying visions, Peg (Katey Sagal) is shown to be the obedient, well-coiffed bride of a wealthy yuppie named played by Ted McGinley, who would later join the series' cast in the role of Jefferson D'Arcy(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Who'll Stop the Rain?. Proclaiming himself "One Man Against Nature," Al (Ed O'Neill) declares war against the Bundy home's leaky roof. Refusing to call in a professional, Al is determined to repair the leak himself--no matter how often, and how predictably, he falls off the roof. Elsewhere, Steve (David Garrison lands a job at Slither's pet shop, only to reconsider his position when wife Marcy (Amanda Bearse) gets bitten by a hostile guinea pig. This episode received an Emmy nomination for editing(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: A Taxing Problem. Thanks to the creative bookkeeping of Peg Bundy (Katey Sagal), the family files a tax return that comes up short by about $5000. To avoid being thrown in jail, Al (Ed O'Neill) casts about for some fast money--and thinks he finds it when a married couple (Paul Coutos, Coleen Maloney) is willing to purchase Peg's hair. Meanwhile, Steve Rhodes (David Garrison) reveals more information than his wife Marcy (Amanda Bearse) is willing to hear. This is the last episode to feature David Garrison as a regular, but not the last to be telecast(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Rock and Roll Girl. When Al tells the kids that they're going to have to earn their own keep, Kelly becomes a singer with a group called The Gutter Cats (playing themselves). Enterprising Bud likewise finds work--as Kelly's agent, with most of her earnings coming his way. Listen for a brief but pointed reference to the home town of Married. . .With Children's "bete noire", housewife-activist Terry Rakolta. This is the final episode to feature David Garrison as a regular(n)
